▁Raa ▁ko ▁ra ▁ru ▁mua ana ▁baa ▁dia ar ▁walang oro ▁a ▁pir pir ▁anun ▁I oa anes ▁ma ▁dia ar ▁mur mur ▁Iesu , ▁a ▁ia ana ▁A and eria as , ▁a ▁tein ▁Simon ▁Petero . </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁muga ana ▁ut naa ▁A and eria as ▁i ▁pa ami , ▁i ▁baat ▁paa ▁tena lik ▁Simon , ▁ma ▁i ▁wap uai ▁naa , ▁" M ia at ▁aa ▁baat ▁paa ▁a ▁Mesa ia !" ▁( a ▁kuk uraa ina ▁baa ▁Ka arisito ). </s> rai_Latn
▁A and eria as ▁i ▁ben ▁paa ▁Simon ▁kar om ▁Iesu . ▁Baa ▁Iesu ▁i ▁babo i , ▁i ▁piri ▁ta ana ▁naa , ▁" U i ▁Simon , ▁a ▁nat un ▁I oa anes , ▁din ▁wa at ung ▁a ▁ia am ▁baa ▁Ke pa as . " ▁( U ▁ra ▁pir pir ▁Grik ▁di ▁wa at ungi ▁naa ▁Petero , ▁a ▁kuk uraa ina ▁ina ▁wa at .) </s> rai_Latn
▁Raa ▁bung ▁tali li ▁balet , ▁Iesu ▁i ▁nem ▁na ▁wina waan ▁ur ong ▁Ga ali la ia . ▁I ▁bara ata ▁paa ▁Pili po , ▁ma ▁i ▁piri ▁ta ana ▁naa , ▁" Un ▁mur mur ▁ia au . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Pili po ▁ia ▁ta ang ir ong ▁B etsa a ida , ▁a ▁ta amaan ▁anun ▁A and eria as ▁ma ▁Petero . </s> rai_Latn
▁Pili po ▁i ▁baat ▁paa ▁Nat anaa el , ▁ma ▁i ▁wap uai ▁naa , ▁" M ia at ▁aa ▁baat ▁paa ▁a ▁mua ana ▁baa ▁Moses ▁i ▁pir pir ▁muga ▁ta au ▁uni ▁u ▁ra ▁Buk ▁na ▁Na aga gon , ▁ma ▁ia ▁baa ▁a ▁kum ▁prop et ▁ka ai ▁diat ▁aa ▁we wap ua ▁muga ▁ta au ▁uni ▁u ▁ra ▁nun diat ▁kum ▁tim timu , ▁ia ▁Iesu ▁a ▁te ▁Na asar et , ▁nat un ▁I ose p . " </s> rai_Latn
▁I aku ▁Nat anaa el ▁i ▁baal ui ▁ku ▁naa , ▁" Na asar et ! ▁Lela wa ai , ▁ta ▁ko ina ▁ut naa ▁ut ▁in ▁waan ▁pa at ▁ta ang ir ong ▁Na asar et ?" ▁Pili po ▁i ▁baal ui ▁naa , ▁" Un ▁waan ▁ku ▁urin ▁baa ▁un ▁babo i . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁Iesu ▁i ▁babo ▁paa ▁Nat anaa el ▁i ▁waan ▁pa at ▁kar omi , ▁i ▁piri ▁naa , ▁" A ▁te ▁Israa el ▁mulu ▁ut ▁mi , ▁pa ▁i ▁nun ura ▁war war uga . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Nat anaa el ▁i ▁tiri ▁Iesu ▁naa , ▁" U ▁nun ura ▁le lawa ai ▁ia au ?" ▁I ▁baal ui ▁naa , ▁" B aa ▁Pili po ▁i ▁ben ▁pa ▁ui ▁urin , ▁ia au ▁aa ▁babo ▁muga ▁wa ▁ui ▁baa ▁kura a ▁u ▁ki ▁ta au ▁natu da angi ▁ra ▁in ▁diwa ai ▁na ▁fig . " </s> rai_Latn

▁Iesu ▁i ▁piri ▁ta ana ▁naa , ▁" L ela wa ai , ▁u ▁nur nur ▁mara aga am ▁baa ▁ia au ▁wap ua ▁ui ▁naa ▁u ▁ki ▁ta au ▁natu da angi ▁ra ▁in ▁diwa ai ▁na ▁fig ? ▁Nam ur ▁un ▁babo ▁a ▁kum ▁nga alanga ala ▁na ▁ut naa ▁a akit ▁in ▁waan ▁pa at , ▁in ▁nga ala ▁ko ▁ra ▁ut naa ▁mi ▁u ▁babo i . " </s> rai_Latn

▁Nam ur ▁baa ▁ru ▁bung ▁i ▁ra ap , ▁di ▁paam ▁a ▁luka ara ▁na ▁pa akama au ▁ir ong ▁Ka ana , ▁u ▁ra ▁papa ar ▁Ga ali la ia . ▁Naan ▁Iesu ▁i ▁waan ▁ut . </s> rai_Latn
▁Ma ▁di ▁a aring ▁ka ai ▁Iesu ▁ma ▁ra ▁nuna ▁kum ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer ▁kupi ▁diat ▁a ▁waan ▁u ▁ra ▁pa akama au . </s> rai_Latn

▁Naan ▁Iesu ▁i ▁wap ua ▁a ▁kum ▁t ult ul ▁naa , ▁" M ua at ▁a ▁paam ▁ku ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁baa ▁i ▁piri ▁taa ▁mua at ▁kupi ▁mua at ▁a ▁pa ami . " </s> rai_Latn
▁6 ▁na ▁nga alanga ala ▁na ▁pa laa ▁na ▁wa at ▁diat ▁tur ▁mat ira ▁kup ▁a ▁gin igi , ▁wela ar ▁ut ▁ma ▁ra ▁na aga gon ▁ko ▁ra ▁lotu ▁anu ▁ra ▁taara ▁I uda ia . ▁Un ▁ra ara ain ▁pa laa ▁na ▁wa at ▁mi , ▁di ▁la ana ▁wat engi ▁ma ▁ra ▁ru ▁no ina ▁baa ▁tula ▁no ina ▁ga alon ▁na ▁pa laa . </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁piri ▁taa ▁ra ▁kum ▁t ult ul ▁naa , ▁" M ua at ▁a ▁itu p ▁at eng ▁taa ▁a ▁kum ▁pa laa ▁na ▁wa at ▁ma ▁ra ▁pa laa . " ▁Ma ▁diat ▁itu p ▁at eng ▁ra ap ▁ta ▁diat . </s> rai_Latn
▁Io , ▁Iesu ▁i ▁tula ▁diat ▁naa , ▁" M ua at ▁a ▁itu p ▁paa ▁ta ▁pa laa ▁ko ▁ra ▁kum ▁pa laa ▁na ▁wa at , ▁ma ▁mua at ▁a ▁loi ▁kar om ▁ia ▁baa ▁i ▁na aga gon ▁a ▁luka ara . " ▁Ma ▁diat ▁pa ami ▁len maa . </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁a ▁mua ana ▁baa ▁i ▁na aga gon ▁a ▁luka ara ▁i ▁inim ▁tama ai , ▁a ▁pa laa ▁maa ▁ia ▁waa in ▁ra ap . ▁Pa ▁i ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁a ▁waa in ▁mi ▁i ▁waan ▁ta anga wa ai , ▁a ▁kum ▁t ult ul ▁ku ▁baa ▁diat ▁itu pi ▁diat ▁nun urai . ▁I ▁w ataa ▁ingen ▁paa ▁a ▁mua ana ▁baa ▁i ▁pa akama au ▁u ▁ra ▁bung ▁maa , </s> rai_Latn
▁ma ▁i ▁piri ▁ta ana ▁naa , ▁" A ▁taara ▁ra ap ▁diat ▁la ana ▁wa inim ▁muga ▁a ▁taara ▁ma ▁ra ▁ko ina ▁waa in . ▁Baa ▁diat ▁aa ▁inim ▁iwan , ▁io , ▁diat ▁wa inim ▁maku ▁a ▁taara ▁ma ▁ra ▁waa in ▁baa ▁pa ▁i ▁ko ina ▁waka ak . ▁I aku ▁ui , ▁u ▁w eta baar ▁mara aga am ▁ma ▁ra ▁ko ina ▁waa in ▁a akit ▁mi . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Mi ▁ia ▁a ▁muga ana ▁wak ilang ▁baa ▁Iesu ▁i ▁pa ami . ▁I ▁pa ami ▁ir ong ▁Ka ana ▁u ▁ra ▁papa ar ▁Ga ali la ia . ▁I ▁wa iaa ▁pa at ▁an una ▁min ama ar ▁mai , ▁ma ▁an una ▁kum ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer ▁diat ▁nur nur ▁uni . </s> rai_Latn
▁Nam ur , ▁baa ▁a ▁pa akama au ▁mi ▁ia ▁ra ap , ▁i ▁waan ▁ur ong ▁Ka ap erna a um , ▁diat ▁we ur ▁ma ▁na ana , ▁a ▁kum ▁tat ena ▁liklik ▁ma ▁an una ▁kum ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer . ▁Di at ▁ki ▁mat ira ▁a ▁kaba ana ▁bung ▁ut . </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁a ▁luka ara ▁na ▁waan ▁lika ai ▁anu ▁ra ▁taara ▁I uda ia ▁i ▁mara wa ai , ▁Iesu ▁i ▁waan ▁una anga ▁Ier usalem . </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁i ▁ruk ▁un ▁raa ▁paka ana ▁ko ▁ra ▁ruma ▁na ▁w eta baar , ▁i ▁babo ▁a ▁taara ▁diat ▁wi ura ▁a ▁kum ▁bul umaka au , ▁ma ▁ra ▁kum ▁sip , ▁ma ▁ra ▁kum ▁buna , ▁ma ▁i ▁babo ▁ka ai ▁a ▁kum ▁tena ▁kia ana ▁ma ani , ▁diat ▁kiki ▁naa ▁ra ▁nun diat ▁kum ▁lu wu . </s> rai_Latn
▁I ▁w iri ▁paa ▁a ▁kum ▁a aru ▁kup ▁in ▁a aru ▁na ▁w inei um , ▁ma ▁i ▁lu ▁pari ▁wa ▁diat ▁ra ap ▁mai . ▁I ▁lu ▁pari ▁wa ▁a ▁kum ▁bul umaka au ▁ma ▁ra ▁kum ▁sip , ▁ma ▁i ▁ong ▁lam ira ▁wa ▁a ▁kum ▁ma ani ▁anu ▁ra ▁kum ▁tena ▁kia ana ▁ma ani , ▁ma ▁i ▁ong ▁puku ▁wa ▁an undi at ▁kum ▁lu wu . </s> rai_Latn
▁Ma ▁i ▁piri ▁taan ▁diat ▁baa ▁diat ▁wi ura ▁a ▁kum ▁buna , ▁" M ua at ▁a ▁lo ▁pari ▁wa ▁diat ▁ta anga ▁min ! ▁Ma ▁koku ▁mua at ▁puku ▁paa ▁a ▁ruma ▁anun ▁Tama ang ▁kup ▁a ▁ruma ▁na ▁wi ura !" </s> rai_Latn

▁A ▁taara ▁I uda ia ▁diat ▁waan ▁pa at ▁balet ▁kar om ▁Iesu ▁ma ▁diat ▁tiri ▁naa , ▁" W oi ▁na ▁wak ilang ▁un ▁wa iaa ▁mia at ▁uni , ▁kupi ▁mia at ▁a ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁u ▁paam ▁ak oto ▁a ▁na aga gon ▁kupi ▁un ▁paam ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁mai ▁mi ?" </s> rai_Latn

▁Baa ▁Iesu ▁i ▁pir pir ▁u ▁ra ▁ruma ▁anun ▁God , ▁i ▁pir pir ▁wel wela ar ▁ut ▁u ▁ra ▁pan ina . </s> rai_Latn

▁Ma ▁Iesu ▁pa ▁i ▁nur nur ▁un ▁te , ▁kab ina ▁maa ▁i ▁nun ura ▁a ▁taara ▁ra ap . </s> rai_Latn

▁A ▁tabu an ▁i ▁piri ▁ta ana ▁naa , ▁" T ada aru , ▁taba ara ▁ia au ▁ma ▁ra ▁pa laa ▁maa , ▁kupi ▁koku ▁ma ▁ia au ▁mar uk , ▁ma ▁koku ▁ma ▁ia au ▁waan ▁liklik ▁urin ▁kup ▁a ▁init up . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁piri ▁ta ana ▁naa , ▁" Un ▁waan , ▁ma ▁un ▁ben ▁paa ▁anum ▁mua ana ▁ma ▁mur ▁a ▁waan ▁tali li ▁balet ▁urin . " </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁tabu an ▁i ▁baal ui ▁naa , ▁" Pa ▁nung ▁ta ▁mua ana . " ▁Iesu ▁i ▁piri ▁naa , ▁" A ▁ling tat una ▁ut ▁maa ▁u ▁piri ▁naa ▁pa ▁num ▁ta ▁mua ana . </s> rai_Latn
▁U ▁aa ▁taula a ▁ma ▁lima ▁na ▁mua ana , ▁ma ▁raa ▁maa ▁u ▁ki ▁unga ai ▁mai ▁mari , ▁wak ir ▁anum ▁mua ana . ▁A ▁ling tat una ▁ut ▁maa ▁u ▁piri ▁ta ang . " </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁tabu an ▁i ▁baal ui ▁naa , ▁" T ada aru , ▁mi ▁ia au ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁ui ▁a ▁prop et . </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁kum ▁tap tab umia at ▁ta anga ▁namu ga ▁diat ▁lot l otu ▁kar om ▁God ▁u ▁ra ▁ta anga ai ▁bi , ▁i aku ▁mua at ▁a ▁taara ▁I uda ia ▁mua at ▁piri ▁naa ▁din ▁lotu ▁ku ▁kar om ▁God ▁ina anga ▁Ier usalem . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁piri ▁ta ana ▁naa , ▁" Ba boi , ▁a ▁ling tat una ▁bi ▁ang ▁piri ▁ta am , ▁a ▁paka ana ▁bung ▁in ▁waan ▁pa at , ▁baa ▁pa ▁mua at ▁a ▁lotu ▁ma ▁kar om ▁Tama ang ▁u ▁ra ▁ta anga ai ▁mi , ▁ma ▁ina anga ▁ka ai ▁Ier usalem ▁pate . </s> rai_Latn
▁Mua at ▁a ▁kum ▁te ▁Sama aria ▁pa ▁mua at ▁nun ura ▁ia ▁baa ▁mua at ▁lot l otu ▁kar omi , ▁ma ▁mia at ▁a ▁taara ▁I uda ia ▁mia at ▁nun ura ▁ut ▁ia ▁baa ▁mia at ▁lot l otu ▁kar omi , ▁kab ina ▁maa ▁a ▁war wala a un ▁i ▁waan ▁pa at ▁ut ▁ko ▁ra ▁taara ▁I uda ia . </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁paka ana ▁bung ▁in ▁waan ▁pa at ▁ma ▁mi ▁ia ▁waan ▁pa at , ▁baa ▁a ▁kum ▁dow ot ▁na ▁tena ▁lotu ▁diat ▁a ▁lotu ▁kar om ▁Tama ang ▁u ▁ra ▁nion ▁ma ▁u ▁ra ▁ling tat una . ▁A ▁kum ▁manga ana ▁tena ▁lotu ▁len maa ▁Tama ang ▁i ▁nem ▁a akit ▁diat . </s> rai_Latn
▁God ▁a ▁nion , ▁ma ▁diat ▁baa ▁diat ▁lot l otu ▁kar omi , ▁diat ▁a ▁lotu ▁ut ▁u ▁ra ▁nion ▁ma ▁u ▁ra ▁ling tat una . " </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁tabu an ▁i ▁piri ▁ta ana ▁naa , ▁" I aa u ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁a ▁Mesa ia ▁baa ▁di ▁wa at ungi ▁naa ▁Ka arisito , ▁in ▁waan ▁pa at , ▁ma ▁in ▁wap ua ana ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁ra ap ▁kar om ▁mia at . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁baal ui ▁naa , ▁" I aa u ▁ut ▁mi ▁ia au ▁pir pir ▁ta am . " </s> rai_Latn
▁U ▁ra ▁paka ana ▁bung ▁ut ▁maa , ▁a ▁kum ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer ▁diat ▁waan ▁tali li , ▁diat ▁kaka ian ▁a akit ▁baa ▁diat ▁babo ▁Iesu ▁dia ar ▁pir pir ▁ma ▁ra ▁tabu an . ▁I aku ▁maa ▁pa ▁te ▁kon ▁diat ▁i ▁tiri ▁naa , ▁" U ▁nem ▁aa wa ?" ▁baa ▁len bi , ▁" A awa ▁kab ina ▁baa ▁u ▁pir pir ▁mai ?" </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁tabu an ▁maa ▁i ▁waan ▁paa ▁ko ▁ra ▁nuna ▁in ▁pa laa , ▁i ▁waan ▁tali li ▁kup ▁a ▁ta amaan ▁ma ▁i ▁wap ua ▁a ▁taara ▁mat ira ▁naa , </s> rai_Latn
▁" A ai , ▁mua at ▁a ▁waan ▁urin , ▁mua at ▁a ▁babo ▁raa ▁mua ana ▁i ▁wap ua ▁ia au ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁ra ap ▁baa ▁ia au ▁aa ▁paam ▁tata ai ▁namu ga . ▁Kana api ▁ia ▁ma ▁duk ▁baa ▁a ▁Mesa ia ?" </s> rai_Latn
▁Io , ▁a ▁taara ▁maa ▁diat ▁waan ▁paa ▁ko ▁ra ▁ta amaan , ▁ma ▁diat ▁waan ▁kar om ▁Iesu . </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁a ▁tabu an ▁ia ▁waan , ▁a ▁kum ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer ▁diat ▁aar ingi ▁naa , ▁" T ena ▁wa wer , ▁un ▁wanga an ▁paa . " </s> rai_Latn
▁I aku ▁Iesu ▁i ▁ba alu ▁diat ▁ku ▁naa , ▁" Anga ang ▁ut naa ▁na ▁win anga an ▁kuri ▁ut ▁baa ▁pa ▁mua at ▁nun urai . " </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁kum ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer ▁diat ▁tiri ▁wet wet ala ai ▁diat ▁naa , ▁" K uraa ▁te ▁ia ▁taba ara ▁ta ai ▁duk ▁ma ▁ta ▁ut naa ▁na ▁win anga an ?" </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁piri ▁taan ▁diat ▁naa , ▁" Anga ang ▁ut naa ▁na ▁win anga an ▁bari ▁ia , ▁baa ▁ang ▁tara am ▁u ▁ra ▁nem nem ▁anun ▁ia ▁baa ▁i ▁tula ▁wa ▁ia au ▁urin , ▁ma ▁ang ▁paam ▁ara ap ▁wa ▁an una ▁pin apa am . </s> rai_Latn
▁Mua at ▁la ana ▁piri ▁len bi , ▁' Wa at ▁na ▁kala ang ▁ut ba ai ▁kura a ▁baa ▁din ▁tanga a ▁mara aga am .' ▁I aku ▁ia au ▁piri ▁taa ▁mua at ▁naa : ▁Mua at ▁a ▁babo ▁tak ado ▁un amu ga , ▁ma ▁mua at ▁a ▁babo ▁a ▁kum ▁pin apa am , ▁diat ▁aa ▁mu gaan ▁ra ap , ▁ma ▁ia ▁ot ▁kupi ▁din ▁tanga ai . </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁mua ana ▁baa ▁i ▁tanga a ▁apa at ▁a ▁wai ▁ra ▁pin apa am , ▁i ▁lo ▁a ▁wed ok ▁uni . ▁Ma ▁a ▁wai ▁ra ▁nuna ▁tin angaa ▁a ▁ut naa ▁kup ▁a ▁lalaa un ▁tak um , ▁kupi ▁a ▁mua ana ▁baa ▁i ▁mama ar ut ▁ma ▁a ▁mua ana ▁baa ▁i ▁tanga a , ▁dia ar ▁a ▁ora ▁gaa ia ▁unga ai . </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁pir pir ▁baa ▁a ▁taara ▁diat ▁la ana ▁piri ▁i ▁ling tat una ▁ut , ▁len bi , ▁' R aa ▁i ▁mama ar ut , ▁ma ▁raa ▁i ▁tanga a .' </s> rai_Latn
▁Io , ▁ia au ▁tula ▁mua at ▁kupi ▁mua at ▁a ▁tanga a ▁u ▁ra ▁pin apa am ▁baa ▁mua at ▁ut ▁pa ▁mua at ▁maar ut ▁ta ai . ▁Raa ▁taara ▁ingen ▁ut ▁diat ▁paam ▁ta ai , ▁ma ▁mua at , ▁mua at ▁lo ▁paa ▁a ▁wed ok ▁i ▁ra ▁nun diat ▁pin apa am . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Mong oro ▁na ▁te ▁Sama aria ▁ko ▁ra ▁ta amaan ▁maa ▁diat ▁nur nur ▁un ▁Iesu . ▁Di at ▁nur nur ▁kab ina ▁u ▁ra ▁pir pir ▁anu ▁ra ▁tabu an ▁baa ▁i ▁piri ▁taan ▁diat ▁naa , ▁" I ▁wap ua ▁ia au ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁ra ap ▁baa ▁ia au ▁paam ▁ta ai ▁namu ga . " </s> rai_Latn

▁Ma ▁mong oro ▁balet ▁diat ▁nur nur , ▁kab ina ▁u ▁ra ▁nuna ▁pir pir . </s> rai_Latn

▁A ▁taara ▁ta ang ir ong ▁Ga ali la ia ▁diat ▁aa ▁waan ▁paa ▁u ▁ra ▁luka ara ▁na ▁waan ▁lika ai ▁ina anga ▁Ier usalem ▁ma ▁diat ▁aa ▁babo ▁taa ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁Iesu ▁i ▁pa ami ▁u ▁ra ▁luka ara . ▁Io , ▁baa ▁Iesu ▁i ▁waan ▁pa at ▁ir ong ▁Ga ali la ia , ▁a ▁taara ▁diat ▁gaa ia ▁paai . </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁waan ▁tali li ▁ur ong ▁Ka ana ▁u ▁ra ▁papa ar ▁Ga ali la ia , ▁a ▁ta amaan ▁baa ▁i ▁puku ▁paa ▁a ▁pa laa ▁kupi ▁in ▁waa in ▁ia ai . ▁Raa ▁muk mu ga ▁anu ▁ra ▁mata an itu , ▁nat una lik ▁a ▁mua ana ▁i ▁mala apa ang ▁ir ong ▁Ka ap erna a um . </s> rai_Latn

▁A ▁muk mu ga ▁anu ▁ra ▁mata an itu ▁i ▁piri ▁naa , ▁" T ada aru , ▁daar ▁a ▁waan ▁ga gaa ▁kad uk ▁nat ung lik ▁in ▁maat !" </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁piri ▁ta ana ▁naa , ▁" Un ▁waan ▁ku , ▁nat um lik ▁in ▁lalaa un . " ▁A ▁mua ana ▁maa ▁i ▁nur nur ▁u ▁ra ▁pir pir ▁anun ▁Iesu , ▁ma ▁i ▁waan . </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁pa ▁i ▁waan ▁pa at ▁ut ba ai , ▁an una ▁kum ▁t ult ul ▁diat ▁waan ▁bara atai ▁ma ▁diat ▁wap uai ▁len bi , ▁" N atum lik ▁ia ▁lalaa un . " </s> rai_Latn

▁T amaa ▁ra ▁naat ▁i ▁nuk ▁paa ▁a ▁paka ana ▁bung ▁ut ▁maa ▁Iesu ▁i ▁piri ▁kar omi ▁naa , ▁" N atum lik ▁in ▁lalaa un ▁balet . " ▁Io , ▁di waat ama ana ▁ra ap ▁diat ▁nur nur ▁un ▁Iesu . </s> rai_Latn

▁Raa ▁nga ala ▁na ▁kilo bi ▁na ▁pa laa , ▁di ▁wa at ungi ▁u ▁ra ▁pir pir ▁E bra ai o ▁baa ▁B esa ataa , ▁i ▁ki ▁ina anga ▁Ier usalem , ▁mara wa ai ▁u ▁ra ▁bon ana aka ▁baa ▁di ▁wa at ungi ▁naa ▁" R uk ruk ▁na ▁sip . " ▁Ma ▁lima ▁na ▁bara ada ▁diat ▁tur ▁lili ▁paa ▁a ▁kilo bi ▁maa . </s> rai_Latn

▁A ▁mua ana ▁maa ▁i ▁baal ui ▁naa , ▁" Le , ▁pa ▁te ▁i ▁la ana ▁wara aut ▁ia au ▁kupi ▁in ▁lo ▁ta ▁ia au ▁u ▁ra ▁paka ana ▁bung ▁baa ▁a ▁pa laa ▁i ▁bua bua ▁uni . ▁Baa ▁ia au ▁nem ▁na ▁waan ▁kupi ▁ang ▁r ariu , ▁raa ▁ingen ▁ku ▁in ▁kala a ▁muga ▁baat ▁pa ▁ia au . " </s> rai_Latn

▁I aku ▁a ▁mua ana ▁maa ▁pa ▁i ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁woi ▁maa ▁i ▁wala angala anga ▁paai , ▁kab ina ▁u ▁ra ▁kor ▁na ▁taara ▁baa ▁Iesu ▁i ▁waan ▁nali wan ▁taan ▁diat . </s> rai_Latn
▁Nam ur ▁ut , ▁Iesu ▁i ▁bara ata ▁paa ▁a ▁mua ana ▁maa ▁u ▁ra ▁ruma ▁na ▁w eta baar . ▁I ▁piri ▁ta ana ▁naa , ▁" Ba boi , ▁u ▁aa ▁la angala anga ▁mi . ▁Koku ▁balet ▁ma ▁u ▁paam ▁a aka ina , ▁kad uk ▁ta ▁a aka ina ▁ut naa ▁a akit ▁ma ▁in ▁man ong ▁ui ▁nam ur . " </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁mua ana ▁maa ▁i ▁waan ▁ma ▁i ▁wap ua ▁a ▁kum ▁te ▁I uda ia ▁naa , ▁" I esu ▁ut ▁i ▁wala angala anga ▁pa ▁ia au . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Io , ▁an undi at ▁kum ▁a aka ina ▁mang amanga an ▁kar om ▁Iesu ▁i ▁tur pa ai ▁mat ira , ▁maa ▁kab ina ▁i ▁paam ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁mi ▁u ▁ra ▁Bung ▁Sa aba at . </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁piri ▁taan ▁diat ▁naa , ▁" T ama ang ▁pa ▁i ▁ngo ▁ma ▁ra ▁pin apa am ▁na ▁we wara aut , ▁len maa ▁ia au ▁ka ai ▁pang ▁ngo ▁ma ▁ra ▁pin apa am ▁na ▁we wara aut ▁kar om ▁a ▁taara . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Mari ▁ia ▁a ▁kab ina ▁baa ▁a ▁kum ▁te ▁I uda ia ▁diat ▁nem ▁aak iti ▁naa ▁diat ▁a ▁aak ▁doko ▁Iesu . ▁Di at ▁ka anka an ▁kar om ▁Iesu ▁wak ir ▁i ▁kab ina ▁ku ▁baa ▁i ▁papa am ▁u ▁ra ▁Bung ▁Sa aba at . ▁I ▁kab ina ▁ka ai ▁maa ▁Iesu ▁ut ▁i ▁wa at ung ▁God ▁baa ▁Tama ana , ▁ma ▁u ▁ra ▁pir pir ▁mi ▁i ▁wela ara ▁ia ▁ut ▁ma ▁God . </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁ba alu ▁diat , ▁ma ▁i ▁piri ▁naa , ▁" I aa u ▁pir ▁a ▁ling tat una ▁taa ▁mua at , ▁Nat un ▁God ▁pa ▁i ▁paam ▁bia a ▁paa ▁ku ▁ta ▁ut naa ▁u ▁ra ▁nuna ▁nem nem , ▁i ▁paam ▁ku ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁baa ▁i ▁babo ▁Tama ana ▁i ▁pa ami . ▁Maa ▁a ▁ut naa ▁ra ap ▁baa ▁Tama ana ▁i ▁pa ami , ▁Nat una ▁ka ai ▁in ▁pa ami . </s> rai_Latn
▁Tama ana ▁i ▁maari ▁Nat una , ▁ma ▁i ▁wa iaa ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁ra ap ▁baa ▁i ▁la ana ▁pa ami ▁kar omi . ▁Ma ▁in ▁wa ia ai ▁ka ai ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁nga alanga ala ▁na ▁ut naa ▁kon ▁raa ▁manga an ▁mi , ▁kupi ▁mua at ▁a ▁kaka ian ▁uni . </s> rai_Latn
▁W ela ar ▁ma ▁Tama ana ▁i ▁wat ur ▁paa ▁a ▁kum ▁mina at ▁ma ▁i ▁taba ara ▁diat ▁ma ▁ra ▁lalaa un , ▁len ka ai ▁maa ▁kar om ▁Nat una , ▁in ▁taba ara ▁diat ▁baa ▁i ▁nemi ▁kupi ▁in ▁taba ara ▁diat ▁ma ▁ra ▁lalaa un . </s> rai_Latn
▁Tama ana ▁pa ▁in ▁na aga gon ▁te , ▁i aku ▁i ▁taar ▁taa ▁a ▁na aga gon ▁ra ap ▁taan ▁Nat una , ▁kupi ▁in ▁na aga gon ▁mai , </s> rai_Latn
▁kupi ▁a ▁taara ▁ra ap ▁diat ▁a ▁ru ▁Nat una ▁wela ar ▁ma ▁diat ▁ru ▁Tama ana . ▁Te ▁baa ▁pa ▁i ▁ru ▁Nat una , ▁pa ▁i ▁ru ▁ka ai ▁Tama ana , ▁ia ▁baa ▁i ▁tula ▁wai ▁urin . </s> rai_Latn
▁" I aa u ▁pir ▁a ▁ling tat una ▁taa ▁mua at , ▁te ▁baa ▁i ▁walang oro ▁an ung ▁kum ▁pir pir ▁ma ▁i ▁nur nur ▁un ▁ia ▁baa ▁i ▁tula ▁wa ▁ia au ▁urin , ▁ia ▁paam ▁ak oto ▁a ▁lalaa un ▁tak um , ▁ma ▁pa ▁in ▁wir ua ▁u ▁ra ▁na aga gon . ▁Ia ▁waan ▁ko ▁ra ▁mina at ▁kup ▁a ▁lalaa un ▁tak um . </s> rai_Latn
▁I aa u ▁pir ▁a ▁ling tat una ▁taa ▁mua at , ▁a ▁paka ana ▁bung ▁in ▁waan ▁pa at , ▁ma ▁mi ▁ia ▁waan ▁pa at , ▁baa ▁a ▁kum ▁mina at ▁diat ▁a ▁walang oro ▁a ▁Nat un ▁God , ▁ma ▁diat ▁baa ▁diat ▁walang oro i ▁diat ▁a ▁lalaa un . </s> rai_Latn
▁God ▁a ▁kabi ▁ra ▁lalaa un ▁ma ▁i ▁taari ▁ka ai ▁kar om ▁Nat una , ▁ia ▁ka ai ▁a ▁kabi ▁ra ▁lalaa un . </s> rai_Latn
▁God ▁i ▁taar ▁taa ▁a ▁dek dek ▁ta ana ▁kupi ▁in ▁na aga gon ▁a ▁taara ▁mai , ▁kab ina ▁maa ▁ia ▁a ▁N atu ▁ra ▁Mua ana . </s> rai_Latn
▁Koku ▁mua at ▁kaka ian ▁u ▁ra ▁pir pir ▁mi . ▁A ▁paka ana ▁bung ▁in ▁waan ▁pa at , ▁baa ▁diat ▁ra ap ▁baa ▁diat ▁in ep ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁tung ▁na ▁mina at ▁diat ▁a ▁walang oro ▁in ▁inga ana . </s> rai_Latn
▁Di at ▁a ▁waan ▁pa at ▁ko ▁ra ▁kum ▁tung ▁na ▁mina at . ▁Di at ▁baa ▁diat ▁aa ▁paam ▁taa ▁a ▁ko ina ▁mang amanga an ▁diat ▁a ▁tur ▁ko ▁ra ▁mina at ▁kup ▁a ▁lalaa un ▁tak um . ▁Ma ▁diat ▁ka ai ▁baa ▁diat ▁aa ▁paam ▁taa ▁a aka ina ▁mang amanga an , ▁diat ▁a ▁tur ▁ko ▁ra ▁mina at ▁kup ▁a ▁win irua ▁tak um . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁pir pir ▁ut ba ai ▁kar om ▁a ▁kum ▁te ▁I uda ia , ▁i ▁piri ▁naa , ▁" Pa ▁ia au ▁paam ▁bia a ▁ku ▁ta ▁ut naa ▁u ▁ra ▁nung ▁nem nem , ▁ia au ▁na aga gon ▁wela ar ▁ma ▁ra ▁ut naa ▁ia au ▁walang oro i . ▁Ma ▁an ung ▁na aga gon ▁i ▁tak ado , ▁maa ▁pa ▁ia au ▁mur ▁a ▁nuk nuk ing , ▁ia au ▁mur mur ▁ut ▁a ▁nuk n ukin ▁ia ▁baa ▁i ▁tula ▁wa ▁ia au ▁urin . </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁ia au ▁we wap ua ▁balet ▁ut ▁un ▁ia au , ▁an ung ▁we wap ua ▁pa ▁in ▁mawa at . </s> rai_Latn
▁Raa ▁ingen ▁ut ▁i ▁we wap ua ▁un ▁ia au , ▁ma ▁ia au ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁an una ▁we wap ua ▁un ▁ia au ▁i ▁ling tat una ▁a akit . </s> rai_Latn

▁Pa ▁ia au ▁iba ▁kup ▁ta ▁taara ▁baa ▁diat ▁a ▁we wap ua ▁un ▁ia au , ▁i aku ▁ia au ▁piri ▁len bi ▁kupi ▁din ▁walaa un ▁mua at . </s> rai_Latn

▁" I aku ▁a ▁we wap ua ▁ka apa ▁un ▁ia au ▁i ▁nga ala ▁taa ▁ra ▁we wap ua ▁ka apa ▁anun ▁I oa anes . ▁A ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁baa ▁ia au ▁la ana ▁pa ami , ▁diat ▁we wap ua ▁ka apa ▁un ▁ia au ▁naa ▁Tama ang ▁i ▁tula ▁wa ▁ia au , ▁maa ▁a ▁kum ▁pin apa am ▁maa , ▁Tama ang ▁i ▁taar ▁ta ▁diat ▁ta ang ▁kupi ▁ang ▁pa ami . </s> rai_Latn

▁U ▁ra ▁tint inip ▁na ▁bung ▁i ▁ra ▁luka ara , ▁a ▁nga at nga at ▁na ▁bung , ▁Iesu ▁i ▁tur ▁ma ▁i ▁pir pir ▁ma ▁ra ▁nga ala ▁na ▁inga ana , ▁i ▁piri ▁naa , ▁" B aa ▁te ▁i ▁mar uk , ▁ko ina ▁baa ▁in ▁waan ▁kar om ▁ia au ▁ma ▁ang ▁wain imi . </s> rai_Latn
▁W ela ar ▁ma ▁di ▁aa ▁timu ▁ta ai ▁u ▁ra ▁Buk ▁Ta abu ▁len bi , ▁' Ia ▁baa ▁in ▁nur nur ▁un ▁ia au , ▁a ▁kum ▁da anim ▁na ▁lalaa un ▁diat ▁a ▁wel ulu ▁pa at ▁ko ▁ra ▁nuna ▁lalaa un .'" </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁pir pir ▁u ▁ra ▁Tak ado ▁na ▁Ni on , ▁baa ▁din ▁taba ara ▁diat ▁mai ▁baa ▁diat ▁nur nur ▁uni . ▁Maa ▁pa ▁di ▁taar ▁ut ba ai ▁a ▁Tak ado ▁na ▁Ni on , ▁kab ina ▁baa ▁Iesu ▁pa ▁i ▁lo ▁ut ba ai ▁an una ▁min ama ar . </s> rai_Latn

▁Tama amua at ▁maa ▁Sa ataan , ▁ma ▁mua at ▁nemi ▁ut ▁naa ▁mua at ▁a ▁mur mur ▁an una ▁nem nem . ▁Ta anga ▁namu ga ▁ut ba ai , ▁ia ▁a ▁tena ▁aak ▁doko ▁taara , ▁ma ▁pa ▁i ▁nun ura ▁a ▁ling tat una , ▁kab ina ▁pa ▁ta ▁ling tat una ▁i ▁ki ▁uni . ▁Baa ▁i ▁pir ▁a ▁war war uga , ▁i ▁pir pir ▁ma ▁ra ▁nuna ▁pir pir ▁mulu ▁ut , ▁kab ina ▁ia ▁a ▁tena ▁war war uga ▁ma ▁ia ▁ut ▁a ▁tamaa ▁ra ▁war war uga . </s> rai_Latn
▁I aa u ▁pir ▁a ▁ling tat una , ▁mi ▁ia ▁a ▁kab ina ▁baa ▁pa ▁mua at ▁nur nur ▁un ▁ia au . </s> rai_Latn
▁W oi ▁kon ▁mua at ▁in ▁tak una ▁ot ▁pa ▁ia au ▁un ▁ta ▁a aka ina ▁mang amanga an ? ▁Baa ▁ia au ▁pir ▁a ▁ling tat una , ▁i ▁lawa ai ▁maa ▁pa ▁mua at ▁nur nur ▁un ▁ia au ? </s> rai_Latn

▁Ma ▁Iesu ▁i ▁ba alu ▁diat ▁naa , ▁" Pa ▁ta ▁tab araan ▁i ▁ruk ▁ta au ▁un ▁ia au . ▁I aa u ▁urur ▁kar om ▁Tama ang , ▁ma ▁mua at , ▁pa ▁mua at ▁urur ▁kar om ▁ia au . </s> rai_Latn

▁Lela wa ai , ▁u ▁nuk i ▁naa ▁ui ▁ma ▁maa ▁u ▁nga ala ▁taan ▁tama amia at ▁Aab ara am ? ▁Aab ara am ▁ia ▁maat , ▁ma ▁ra ▁kum ▁prop et ▁ka ai ▁diat ▁aa ▁maat . ▁U ▁nuk i ▁naa ▁ui ▁woi ▁na ▁manga ana ▁mua ana ▁ui ?" </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁ba alu ▁diat ▁naa , ▁" B aa ▁ia au ▁wanga ala ▁balet ▁pa ▁ia au ▁ut , ▁an ung ▁pir pir ▁pa ▁i ▁gaa ▁un ▁ta ▁ut naa . ▁Tama ang ▁ut ▁i ▁wanga ala ▁pa ▁ia au , ▁ia ▁baa ▁mua at ▁piri ▁naa ▁ia ▁anum ua at ▁God . </s> rai_Latn
▁Mua at , ▁pa ▁mua at ▁nun ura ▁God , ▁ia au , ▁ia au ▁nun urai . ▁Baa ▁ang ▁piri ▁naa ▁pa ▁ia au ▁nun urai , ▁ia au ▁ka ai ▁ang ▁tena ▁war war uga ▁wela ar ▁ma ▁mua at . ▁I aa u ▁nun ura ▁God , ▁ma ▁ia au ▁tart ara am ▁u ▁ra ▁nuna ▁pir pir . </s> rai_Latn

▁Iesu ▁i ▁ba alu ▁diat ▁naa , ▁" B aa ▁gun ▁mua at ▁pula ▁pain ▁te ▁in ▁tak una ▁mua at ▁un ▁ta ▁a aka ina ▁mang amanga an , ▁i aku ▁mi ▁mua at ▁piri ▁naa ▁mua at ▁babo , ▁io , ▁anum ua at ▁mang amanga an ▁a aka ina ▁i ▁ki ▁ut ba ai . " </s> rai_Latn

▁A ▁tena ▁babo ura ▁i ▁ra ▁bon ana aka ▁in ▁pa apa ▁a ara ▁ta ai ▁kupi ▁in ▁ruk . ▁A ▁kum ▁sip ▁diat ▁walang oro ▁lele ▁in ▁inga ana . ▁I ▁w ataa ▁diat ▁ma ▁ra ▁kum ▁ia andi at , ▁ma ▁i ▁ben ▁apari ▁diat . </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁ia ▁ben ▁apari ▁ra ap ▁paa ▁an una ▁kum ▁sip , ▁i ▁muga ▁pa ▁diat ▁ma ▁diat ▁mur m uri , ▁kab ina ▁maa ▁diat ▁walang oro ▁lele ▁in ▁inga ana . </s> rai_Latn
▁Pa ▁diat ▁a ▁mur mur ▁ta ▁wa ira , ▁diat ▁a ▁wel ulu ▁ingen ▁ku ▁koni , ▁maa ▁pa ▁diat ▁walang oro ▁lele ▁in ▁inga ana . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁pir ▁a ▁pir pir ▁wel wela ar ▁mi ▁taan ▁diat , ▁i aku ▁pa ▁diat ▁nun urai ▁baa ▁aa wa ▁maa ▁i ▁pir pir ▁wel wela ar ▁uni . </s> rai_Latn
▁Io , ▁Iesu ▁i ▁piri ▁balet ▁naa , ▁" I aa u ▁pir ▁a ▁ling tat una ▁taa ▁mua at , ▁ia au ▁a ▁bon ana aka ▁anu ▁ra ▁kum ▁sip . </s> rai_Latn
▁Di at ▁baa ▁diat ▁waan ▁pa at ▁muga ▁ta ang , ▁a ▁kum ▁tena ▁wal ong ▁ma ▁a ▁kum ▁tena ▁maang l uraa ▁paa ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa , ▁ma ▁a ▁kum ▁sip ▁pa ▁diat ▁walang oro ▁diat . </s> rai_Latn
▁I aa u ▁a ▁bon ana aka , ▁baa ▁te ▁i ▁ruk ▁uni ▁din ▁walaa uni . ▁In ▁ruk , ▁in ▁pari ▁ma ▁in ▁bara ata ▁ku ▁ana ▁ut naa ▁na ▁win anga an . </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁tena ▁wal ong ▁i ▁ruk ▁ku ▁kupi ▁in ▁wal ong , ▁ma ▁in ▁aak ▁doko ▁a ▁kum ▁sip ▁ma ▁in ▁baana akaka ▁diat . ▁I aku ▁ia au , ▁ia au ▁waan ▁pa at ▁kupi ▁diat ▁a ▁paam ▁ak oto ▁a ▁lalaa un , ▁a ▁lalaa un ▁ling tat una . </s> rai_Latn
▁" I aa u ▁a ▁ko ina ▁tena ▁babo ura ▁sip . ▁I aa u ▁taar ▁taa ▁an ung ▁lalaa un ▁kupi ▁ang ▁maat ▁un ▁diat . </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁mua ana ▁baa ▁di ▁dok d oki ▁ku , ▁wak ir ▁a ▁tena ▁babo ura ▁sip ▁mulu , ▁ma ▁wak ir ▁an una ▁kum ▁sip . ▁Baa ▁i ▁babo ▁paa ▁a ▁karanga ap ▁na ▁pa ap ▁i ▁waan ▁pa at , ▁i ▁wel ulu ▁paa ▁ku ▁ko ▁ra ▁kum ▁sip , ▁kab ina ▁maa ▁i ▁papa am ▁ku ▁kup ▁a ▁ma ani , ▁ma ▁pa ▁i ▁maari ▁a ▁kum ▁sip . ▁Ma ▁a ▁karanga ap ▁na ▁pa ap ▁i ▁kara at ▁diat ▁ma ▁i ▁lu ▁wera ana ▁wa ▁diat . </s> rai_Latn
▁" I aa u ▁a ▁ko ina ▁tena ▁babo ura ▁sip . ▁W ela ar ▁ma ▁Tama ang ▁i ▁nun ura ▁ia au , ▁ma ▁ia au ▁nun ura ▁Tama ang , ▁len ka ai ▁maa ▁ia au ▁nun ura ▁an ung ▁kum ▁sip , ▁ma ▁an ung ▁kum ▁sip ▁ka ai ▁diat ▁nun ura ▁ia au , ▁ma ▁ia au ▁taar ▁taa ▁an ung ▁lalaa un ▁kupi ▁ang ▁maat ▁un ▁diat . </s> rai_Latn
▁An ung ▁raa ▁kum ▁sip ▁ingen ▁ka ai , ▁pa ▁diat ▁ki ▁u ▁ra ▁lip lip ▁na ▁sip ▁mi . ▁Ang ▁ben ▁pa ▁diat ▁ut ka ai , ▁ma ▁diat ▁a ▁walang oro ▁in ▁inga ang , ▁kupi ▁diat ▁ra ap ▁diat ▁a ▁ki ▁ku ▁un ▁raa ▁lip lip ▁na ▁sip , ▁ma ▁raa ▁ot ▁ku ▁in ▁tena ▁babo ura ▁an undi at . </s> rai_Latn
▁" T ama ang ▁i ▁maari ▁ia au , ▁kab ina ▁maa ▁ia au ▁ut ▁ia au ▁taar ▁taa ▁an ung ▁lalaa un , ▁kupi ▁nam ur ▁ang ▁lo ▁paai ▁balet . </s> rai_Latn
▁Pa ▁te ▁in ▁raka an ▁wa ▁an ung ▁lalaa un , ▁ia au ▁ut ▁ang ▁taar ▁ta ai . ▁I aa u ▁ut ▁ia au ▁na aga goni ▁kupi ▁ang ▁taar ▁ta ai , ▁ma ▁ia au ▁ut ▁ia au ▁na aga goni ▁kupi ▁ang ▁lo ▁paai ▁balet . ▁Mari ▁ia ▁a ▁pin apa am ▁maa ▁Tama ang ▁i ▁tula ▁wa ▁ia au ▁kupi ▁ang ▁pa ami . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Ia ▁ru ▁nuk n uki ▁ra ▁kum ▁te ▁I uda ia ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁pir pir ▁mi ▁anun ▁Iesu . </s> rai_Latn

▁Iesu ▁i ▁piri ▁ta ana ▁naa , ▁" L ela wa ai , ▁pa ▁ia au ▁pir ▁ta ai ▁ut ba ai ▁ta am ▁naa , ▁baa ▁un ▁nur nur ▁un ▁babo ▁a ▁min ama ar ▁anun ▁God ?" </s> rai_Latn
▁Io , ▁diat ▁tul ▁kara ai ▁wa ▁ina ▁wa at . ▁Iesu ▁i ▁tata ada ▁una anga ▁nate , ▁ma ▁i ▁piri ▁len bi , ▁" T ama ang , ▁ia au ▁wa at ung ▁waka ak ▁kar om ▁ui , ▁maa ▁u ▁aa ▁walang oro ▁ia au . </s> rai_Latn
▁I aa u ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁u ▁la ana ▁walang oro ▁ia au , ▁i aku ▁ia au ▁pir pir ▁len mi , ▁kab ina ▁u ▁ra ▁taara ▁mi , ▁kupi ▁diat ▁a ▁nur nur ▁baa ▁u ▁tula ▁wa ▁ia au . " </s> rai_Latn

" </s> rai_Latn

▁Iesu ▁ia ▁paam ▁taa ▁mong oro ▁na ▁ut naa ▁na ▁kaka ian ▁nam ata andi at , ▁i aku ▁maa ▁pa ▁diat ▁nur nur ▁uni , </s> rai_Latn
▁kupi ▁a ▁pir pir ▁baa ▁a ▁prop et ▁Aa isaia ▁i ▁pir pir ▁ta au ▁uni ▁in ▁waan ▁pa at ▁ling tat una . ▁I ▁piri ▁len bi , ▁" T ada aru , ▁woi ▁i ▁nur nur ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁baa ▁mia at ▁piri ? ▁Ma ▁woi ▁maa ▁di ▁aa ▁wa iaa ▁taa ▁a ▁dek dek ▁i ▁ra ▁Tada aru ▁ta ana ?" </s> rai_Latn
▁Ma ▁ia ▁pir ▁ta ai ▁ka ai ▁len bi , ▁" God ▁ia ▁wap ula ▁baat ▁wa ▁a ▁mata andi at , ▁ma ▁ia ▁bal bala at ▁baat ▁wa ▁a ▁nuk nuk indi at , ▁kupi ▁koku ▁diat ▁babo ▁ma ▁ra ▁mata andi at , ▁ma ▁koku ▁diat ▁nun ura ▁lelei ▁u ▁ra ▁nuk nuk indi at , ▁ma ▁pa ▁diat ▁a ▁tap uku ▁kar om ▁ia au , ▁kupi ▁ang ▁walaa un ▁pa ▁diat . " ▁Bari ▁ia ▁a ▁kab ina ▁baa ▁pa ▁diat ▁nur nur . </s> rai_Latn
▁Aa isaia ▁i ▁piri ▁len bi ▁maa ▁kab ina ▁ia ▁babo ▁muga ▁wa ▁a ▁min ama ar ▁anun ▁Iesu , ▁ma ▁i ▁pir pir ▁uni . </s> rai_Latn
▁Ma ▁mong oro ▁na ▁taara ▁diat ▁nur nur ▁un ▁Iesu . ▁Raa ▁kum ▁muk mu ga ▁ka ai ▁ko ▁ra ▁taara ▁I uda ia ▁diat ▁nur nur , ▁i aku ▁pa ▁diat ▁pir pir ▁ka apa ▁uni , ▁kad uk ▁a ▁kum ▁Par isa ai o ▁diat ▁a ▁tur ba at ▁wa ▁diat ▁ko ▁ra ▁kum ▁ruma ▁na ▁lotu . </s> rai_Latn
▁Di at ▁baa ▁diat ▁nur nur ▁pa ▁diat ▁pir pir ▁ka apa ▁uni ▁kab ina ▁maa ▁diat ▁nem ▁ku ▁a ▁pir ▁wala awa ▁anu ▁ra ▁taara ▁kar om ▁diat , ▁ma ▁pa ▁diat ▁nuk ▁paa ▁a ▁pir ▁wala awa ▁anun ▁God ▁kar om ▁diat . </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁pir pir ▁ma ▁ra ▁ina ▁nga ala ▁na ▁inga ana ▁len bi , ▁" Ia ▁baa ▁i ▁nur nur ▁un ▁ia au , ▁wak ir ▁i ▁nur nur ▁ku ▁un ▁ia au , ▁i ▁nur nur ▁ut ka ai ▁un ▁ia ▁baa ▁i ▁tula ▁wa ▁ia au ▁urin . </s> rai_Latn
▁Ma ▁ia ▁baa ▁i ▁babo ▁ia au , ▁ia ▁babo ▁taa ▁ia ▁baa ▁i ▁tula ▁wa ▁ia au ▁urin . </s> rai_Latn
▁I aa u ▁aa ▁waan ▁pa at ▁urin ▁u ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al ▁wela ar ▁ma ▁ra ▁ka apa , ▁kupi ▁ia ▁baa ▁i ▁nur nur ▁un ▁ia au , ▁pa ▁in ▁ki ▁u ▁ra ▁bab oto . </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁te ▁i ▁walang oro ▁an ung ▁kum ▁pir pir ▁ma ▁pa ▁i ▁mur m uri , ▁ia au ▁pang ▁na aga goni . ▁Maa ▁pa ▁ia au ▁waan ▁pa at ▁kupi ▁ang ▁na aga gon ▁a ▁rak raka an ▁bua al , ▁ia au ▁waan ▁pa at ▁ku ▁kupi ▁ang ▁walaa uni . </s> rai_Latn
▁Ia ▁baa ▁pa ▁i ▁nem ▁ia au ▁ma ▁pa ▁i ▁tara am ▁u ▁ra ▁nung ▁kum ▁pir pir , ▁an ung ▁kum ▁pir pir ▁ut ▁maa ▁diat ▁a ▁na aga goni ▁u ▁ra ▁tint inip ▁na ▁bung . </s> rai_Latn
▁Maa ▁a ▁kum ▁pir pir ▁baa ▁ia au ▁aa ▁pir ▁tata ai ▁wak ir ▁an ung , ▁Tama ang ▁ut ▁i ▁tula ▁wa ▁ia au ▁mai ▁urin ▁kupi ▁ang ▁piri ▁ma ▁ang ▁we wap ua ▁uni . </s> rai_Latn
▁Ma ▁ia au ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁an una ▁wet ulaa ▁i ▁taar ▁a ▁lalaa un ▁tak um . ▁A ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁ia au ▁piri , ▁Tama ang ▁i ▁tula ▁wa ▁ia au ▁mai ▁kupi ▁ang ▁piri . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁ia ▁mara wa ai ▁a ▁luka ara ▁na ▁waan ▁lika ai , ▁Iesu ▁i ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁ia ▁mara wa ai ▁kupi ▁in ▁waan ▁ma ▁ko ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al , ▁ma ▁in ▁waan ▁kar om ▁Tama ana . ▁I ▁maari ▁a akit ▁an una ▁taara ▁baa ▁diat ▁ki ▁u ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al , ▁ma ▁mi ▁i ▁wa iaa ▁an una ▁nga ala ▁na ▁maar ma ari ▁kar om ▁diat , ▁a ▁maar ma ari ▁baa ▁pa ▁ta ▁tuk tuk ina . </s> rai_Latn
▁U ▁ra ▁mar um , ▁Iesu ▁ma ▁ra ▁nuna ▁kum ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer ▁diat ▁wanga an ▁unga ai . ▁N amu ga ▁taa ▁ra ▁nun diat ▁win anga an , ▁Sa ataan ▁ia ▁ruk ▁ta au ▁un ▁I uda as ▁Is ka ari ot , ▁a ▁nat un ▁Simon , ▁kupi ▁in ▁w agu ▁taa ▁Iesu . </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁Tama ana ▁ia ▁taar ▁ara ap ▁taa ▁a ▁dek dek ▁kar omi ▁kupi ▁in ▁na aga gon ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁ra ap ▁mai , ▁ma ▁i ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁i ▁waan ▁paa ▁ut ▁kon ▁God , ▁ma ▁in ▁waan ▁tali li ▁balet ▁kar om ▁God . </s> rai_Latn
▁Io , ▁i ▁tur ▁paa ▁ko ▁ra ▁win anga an , ▁i ▁raka an ▁wa ▁an una ▁raa ▁ina ▁ma alu ▁baa ▁i ▁burung ▁baat ▁an una ▁min ong ▁mai , ▁i ▁lo ▁paa ▁a ▁taa ol ▁ma ▁i ▁do ▁paai ▁uni . </s> rai_Latn
▁I ▁labo ▁paa ▁a ▁pa laa ▁u ▁ra ▁dis , ▁ma ▁i ▁gi ▁a ▁kum ▁kaki ▁ra ▁nuna ▁kum ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer ▁mai , ▁ma ▁i ▁upa ▁mag ege ▁diat ▁ma ▁ra ▁taa ol ▁baa ▁i ▁do ▁paai ▁uni . </s> rai_Latn

▁Mi ▁ia au ▁taar ▁a ▁mat akina ▁na aga gon ▁kar om ▁mua at ▁naa , ▁mua at ▁a ▁maari ▁wet wet ala ai ▁mua at . ▁W ela ar ▁ma ▁ia au ▁maari ▁mua at , ▁mua at ▁ka ai ▁mua at ▁a ▁maari ▁wet wet ala ai ▁mua at . </s> rai_Latn

▁Iesu ▁i ▁baal ui ▁naa , ▁" L ela wa ai , ▁a ▁ling tat una ▁ut ▁maa ▁u ▁piri ▁naa ▁un ▁maat ▁un ▁ia au ? ▁I aa u ▁pir ▁a ▁ling tat una ▁ta am , ▁baa ▁a ▁kar eke ▁pa ▁in ▁kur kur ekat uk ▁ut ba ai , ▁un ▁we oro ▁tula ▁paka an ▁naa ▁pa ▁u ▁nun ura ▁ia au . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁piri ▁taan ▁diat ▁naa , ▁" K oku ▁i ▁lak lag on ▁a ▁nuk nuk im ua at , ▁mua at ▁a ▁nur nur ▁un ▁God , ▁ma ▁mua at ▁a ▁nur nur ▁ka ai ▁un ▁ia au . </s> rai_Latn
▁Mong oro ▁na ▁kukur ▁ra ▁ruma ▁u ▁ra ▁ruma ▁anun ▁Tama ang . ▁Baa ▁pate , ▁ang ▁wap ua ▁mua at ▁ut ka ai ▁uni . ▁Io , ▁mi ▁ang ▁waan ▁kupi ▁ang ▁wan ina ar ▁taa ▁a ▁paka ana ▁kup ▁mua at . </s> rai_Latn

▁Pili po ▁i ▁piri ▁ta ana ▁naa , ▁" T ada aru , ▁un ▁wa iaa ▁taa ▁Tama am ▁kar om ▁mia at , ▁bi ▁ku ▁ia ▁maa ▁mia at ▁nemi . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁baal ui ▁naa , ▁" P ili po , ▁ia au ▁aa ▁ki ▁iwan ▁unga ai ▁ma ▁mua at , ▁ma ▁pa ▁u ▁nun ura ▁ia au ▁ut ba ai ? ▁Ia ▁baa ▁i ▁babo ▁ia au , ▁ia ▁babo ▁taa ▁Tama ang . ▁A awa ▁kab ina ▁u ▁piri ▁naa ▁ang ▁wa iaa ▁taa ▁Tama ang ▁kar om ▁mua at ? </s> rai_Latn
▁Pa ▁u ▁nur nur ▁naa ▁ia au ▁ki ▁un ▁Tama ang , ▁ma ▁Tama ang ▁i ▁ki ▁un ▁ia au ? ▁A ▁kum ▁pir pir ▁baa ▁ia au ▁piri ▁taa ▁mua at , ▁wak ir ▁an ung . ▁Tama ang ▁baa ▁i ▁ki ▁un ▁ia au ▁i ▁paam ▁an una ▁pin apa am . </s> rai_Latn
▁Mua at ▁a ▁nur nur ▁un ▁ia au ▁baa ▁ia au ▁piri ▁naa ▁ia au ▁ki ▁un ▁Tama ang , ▁ma ▁Tama ang ▁i ▁ki ▁un ▁ia au . ▁Baa ▁pa ▁mua at ▁nur nur ▁u ▁ra ▁nung ▁pir pir , ▁mua at ▁a ▁nur nur ▁ku ▁un ▁ia au ▁kab ina ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁na ▁kaka ian ▁baa ▁ia au ▁pa ami . </s> rai_Latn
▁" I aa u ▁pir ▁a ▁ling tat una ▁taa ▁mua at , ▁ia ▁baa ▁i ▁nur nur ▁un ▁ia au , ▁in ▁paam ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁wela ar ▁ma ▁ia au ▁la ana ▁pa ami , ▁ma ▁in ▁paam ▁a ▁kum ▁nga ala ▁na ▁pin apa am ▁taa ▁ra ▁kum ▁pin apa am ▁ia au ▁aa ▁paam ▁ta ai , ▁kab ina ▁maa ▁ang ▁waan ▁kar om ▁Tama ang . </s> rai_Latn
▁Ma ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁ra ap ▁baa ▁mua at ▁aar ingi ▁u ▁ra ▁ia ang , ▁ang ▁paam ▁ot ▁paai , ▁kupi ▁Tama ana ▁in ▁lo ▁a ▁min ama ar ▁un ▁Nat una . </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁mua at ▁a aring ▁kup ▁ta ▁ut naa ▁u ▁ra ▁ia ang , ▁ang ▁paam ▁ot ▁paai . </s> rai_Latn
▁" B aa ▁mua at ▁maari ▁ia au , ▁mua at ▁a ▁tara am ▁u ▁ra ▁nung ▁kum ▁wet ulaa . </s> rai_Latn
▁Ma ▁ang ▁a aring ▁Tama ang , ▁ma ▁in ▁tula ▁wa ▁bul ung ▁a ▁Tena ▁We wara aut ▁kar om ▁mua at , ▁kupi ▁in ▁ki ▁tak um ▁kar om ▁mua at , ▁a ▁Tak ado ▁na ▁Ni on , ▁ia ▁baa ▁in ▁wap ua ana ▁a ▁ling tat una . </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁taara ▁ko ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al ▁pain ▁diat ▁a ▁nemi , ▁kab ina ▁pa ▁diat ▁a ▁babo ▁lelei ▁ma ▁pa ▁diat ▁a ▁nun urai . ▁I aku ▁mua at , ▁mua at ▁nun ura ▁a ▁Tena ▁We wara aut ▁maa ▁kab ina ▁i ▁ki ▁unga ai ▁ma ▁mua at ▁ma ▁in ▁ki ▁un ▁mua at . </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁ang ▁waan ▁kon ▁mua at , ▁pa ▁mua at ▁a ▁ki ▁na ▁naat ▁na ▁walaa , ▁ang ▁waan ▁tali li ▁balet ▁ku ▁kar om ▁mua at . </s> rai_Latn
▁" Pa ▁in ▁wel we lik ▁ma , ▁baa ▁a ▁taara ▁ko ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al ▁pa ▁diat ▁a ▁babo ▁ia au ▁ma . ▁I aku ▁mua at , ▁mua at ▁a ▁babo ▁ia au . ▁Kab ina ▁baa ▁ia au ▁lalaa un , ▁mua at ▁ka ai ▁mua at ▁a ▁lalaa un . </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁a ▁bung ▁maa ▁in ▁waan ▁pa at , ▁mua at ▁a ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁ia au ▁ki ▁un ▁Tama ang , ▁ma ▁mua at ▁ka ai ▁mua at ▁ki ▁un ▁ia au , ▁ma ▁ia au ▁ki ▁un ▁mua at . </s> rai_Latn
▁Ia ▁baa ▁i ▁paam ▁ak oto ▁an ung ▁kum ▁wet ulaa ▁ma ▁i ▁tara am ▁uni , ▁ia ▁maa ▁i ▁maari ▁ia au . ▁Ma ▁Tama ang ▁in ▁maari , ▁ma ▁ia au ▁ka ai ▁ang ▁maari , ▁ma ▁ang ▁wa iaa ▁ia au ▁kar omi . " </s> rai_Latn
▁I uda as ▁( wak ir ▁I uda as ▁Is ka ari ot ) ▁i ▁piri ▁taan ▁Iesu ▁naa , ▁" T ada aru , ▁aa wa ▁kab ina ▁baa ▁un ▁wa iaa ▁ta ▁ui ▁ku ▁kar om ▁mia at , ▁ma ▁wak ir ▁kar om ▁a ▁taara ▁u ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al ?" </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁baal ui ▁naa , ▁" B aa ▁te ▁i ▁maari ▁ia au , ▁in ▁tara am ▁u ▁ra ▁nung ▁kum ▁wa wer . ▁Io , ▁Tama ang ▁in ▁maari , ▁ma ▁mir ▁ma ▁Tama ang ▁mir ▁a ▁waan ▁kar omi , ▁ma ▁mir ▁a ▁ki ▁unga ai ▁mai . </s> rai_Latn
▁Ia ▁baa ▁pa ▁i ▁maari ▁ia au , ▁pa ▁in ▁tara am ▁u ▁ra ▁nung ▁kum ▁wa wer . ▁Ma ▁a ▁kum ▁pir pir ▁baa ▁mua at ▁walang oro i ▁wak ir ▁an ung , ▁anun ▁Tama ang , ▁ia ▁baa ▁i ▁tula ▁wa ▁ia au ▁urin . </s> rai_Latn
▁" I aa u ▁pir ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁mi ▁taa ▁mua at ▁baa ▁ia au ▁ki ▁ut ba ai ▁kar om ▁mua at . </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁Tena ▁We wara aut , ▁a ▁Tak ado ▁na ▁Ni on , ▁baa ▁Tama ang ▁in ▁tula ▁wai ▁u ▁ra ▁ia ang , ▁in ▁wer ▁mua at ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁ra ap , ▁ma ▁in ▁wan uk ▁taa ▁balet ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁baa ▁ia au ▁aa ▁pir ▁ta ai ▁taa ▁mua at . </s> rai_Latn
▁I aa u ▁taar ▁taa ▁a ▁maal maal ▁kar om ▁mua at , ▁an ung ▁maal maal ▁maa ▁ia au ▁taba ara ▁mua at ▁mai . ▁Pa ▁ia au ▁taba ara ▁mua at ▁wela ar ▁ma ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al ▁i ▁w eta baar . ▁Koku ▁i ▁lak lag on ▁a ▁nuk nuk im ua at , ▁ma ▁koku ▁mua at ▁bur ut . </s> rai_Latn
▁Mua at ▁aa ▁walang oro ▁ta ai ▁baa ▁ia au ▁aa ▁pir ▁ta ai ▁taa ▁mua at ▁naa , ▁' Ang ▁waan ▁paa ▁ma ▁ang ▁waan ▁tali li ▁balet ▁kar om ▁mua at .' ▁Baa ▁mua at ▁maari ▁ia au , ▁io , ▁mua at ▁a ▁gaa ia , ▁maa ▁ang ▁waan ▁kar om ▁Tama ang , ▁maa ▁ia ▁i ▁nga ala ▁ta ang . </s> rai_Latn
▁I aa u ▁aa ▁wap ua ▁am uga ▁ta ▁mua at ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁baa ▁nam ur ▁in ▁waan ▁pa at , ▁ma ▁baa ▁ia ▁waan ▁pa at , ▁mua at ▁a ▁nur nur . </s> rai_Latn
▁" Pang ▁pir pir ▁liklik ▁ma ▁kar om ▁mua at , ▁kab ina ▁a ▁tada aru ▁i ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al ▁mara wa ai ▁ma ▁in ▁waan ▁pa at . ▁Pa ▁ta ▁dek dek ina ▁kupi ▁in ▁uw ia ▁pa ▁ia au ▁mai , </s> rai_Latn
▁i aku ▁ang ▁paam ▁ot ▁ra ap ▁paa ▁ut ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁baa ▁Tama ang ▁i ▁tula ▁wa ▁ia au ▁kupi ▁ang ▁pa ami , ▁kupi ▁a ▁rak raka an ▁bua al ▁in ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁ia au ▁maari ▁Tama ang . ▁Mua at ▁tur ▁ma ▁da at ▁a ▁waan . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁piri ▁naa , ▁" I aa u ▁in ▁diwa ai ▁na ▁waa in ▁ling tat una , ▁ma ▁Tama ang ▁a ▁tena ▁babo ura ▁u ▁ra ▁wan ua ▁na ▁waa in . </s> rai_Latn
▁I ▁bur ▁kutu ▁wa ▁a ▁kum ▁ga gaga ang ▁baa ▁pa ▁diat ▁wa , ▁ma ▁i ▁wag om gom ▁diat ▁baa ▁diat ▁wa , ▁kupi ▁diat ▁a ▁wa ▁mong mong oro ▁na ▁wa indi at . </s> rai_Latn
▁Mua at ▁aa ▁gom gom ▁kab ina ▁u ▁ra ▁pir pir ▁baa ▁ia au ▁aa ▁pir ▁ta ai ▁taa ▁mua at . </s> rai_Latn
▁Mua at ▁a ▁lalaa un ▁un ▁ia au , ▁ma ▁ia au ▁ang ▁lalaa un ▁un ▁mua at . ▁W ela ar ▁ma ▁ra ▁gaga ana ▁waa in ▁pa ▁in ▁wa ▁bia a ▁ku ▁baa ▁pa ▁i ▁para ap ▁u ▁ra ▁in ▁di waa ina , ▁len ka ai ▁maa ▁kar om ▁mua at , ▁pa ▁mua at ▁a ▁wa ▁baa ▁pa ▁mua at ▁lalaa un ▁un ▁ia au . </s> rai_Latn
▁" I aa u ▁ut ▁in ▁diwa ai ▁na ▁waa in , ▁ma ▁mua at ▁a ▁kum ▁ga gaga ang . ▁Ia ▁baa ▁i ▁lalaa un ▁un ▁ia au , ▁ma ▁ia au ▁lalaa un ▁uni , ▁in ▁wa ▁mong oro ▁na ▁wa ina . ▁I aku ▁baa ▁mua at ▁lalaa un ▁ingen ▁kon ▁ia au , ▁pa ▁mua at ▁a ▁pet ▁la ar ▁paa ▁ta ▁ut naa . </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁te ▁pa ▁i ▁lalaa un ▁un ▁ia au , ▁in ▁wela ar ▁ma ▁ra ▁kum ▁mara ang ▁na ▁gaga ana ▁diwa ai , ▁baa ▁din ▁ong ▁wa ▁diat . ▁Din ▁ung ▁unga ai ▁diat , ▁ma ▁din ▁ong ▁ta ▁diat ▁u ▁ra ▁nguan , ▁kupi ▁diat ▁a ▁kup kup ▁mat ira . </s> rai_Latn

▁" T ama ang ▁in ▁lo ▁a ▁min ama ar ▁baa ▁mua at ▁wa ▁mong oro ▁na ▁wa im ua at , ▁ma ▁a ▁wa im ua at ▁in ▁wa ia ai ▁naa ▁mua at ▁an ung ▁kum ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer ▁ling tat una . </s> rai_Latn

▁Bi ▁ia ▁an ung ▁wet ulaa ▁kar om ▁mua at ▁naa , ▁mua at ▁a ▁maari ▁wet wet ala ai ▁mua at , ▁wela ar ▁ma ▁ia au ▁maari ▁mua at . </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁te ▁i ▁ung ▁wa ▁an una ▁lalaa un ▁kupi ▁in ▁maat ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁te pte pa ana , ▁an una ▁maar ma ari ▁i ▁nga ala ▁a akit . ▁Pa ▁ta ▁maar ma ari ▁anun ▁te ▁i ▁wela ar ▁mai . </s> rai_Latn
▁Io , ▁mua at ▁a ▁kum ▁te pte pa ang ▁baa ▁mua at ▁tara am ▁u ▁ra ▁nung ▁kum ▁wet ulaa . </s> rai_Latn
▁Pang ▁wa at ung ▁mua at ▁balet ▁ma ▁naa ▁a ▁kum ▁t ult ul , ▁maa ▁a ▁t ult ul ▁pa ▁i ▁nun ura ▁a ▁ut naa ▁baa ▁an una ▁tada aru ▁i ▁pa ami . ▁I aku ▁ia au ▁wa at ung ▁mua at ▁naa ▁a ▁kum ▁te pte pa ang , ▁maa ▁ia au ▁aa ▁pir ▁ara ap ▁taa ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁taa ▁mua at ▁baa ▁ia au ▁walang oro i ▁kon ▁Tama ang . </s> rai_Latn
▁Wak ir ▁mua at ▁pi lak ▁pa ▁ia au , ▁ia au ▁ut ▁ia au ▁pi lak ▁pa ▁mua at . ▁Ma ▁ia au ▁tula ▁wa ▁mua at ▁kupi ▁mua at ▁a ▁waan ▁ma ▁mua at ▁a ▁wa ▁a ▁wa im ua at , ▁ma ▁a ▁wa im ua at ▁in ▁ki ▁tak um . ▁Ma ▁Tama ang ▁in ▁taba ara ▁mua at ▁ma ▁ra ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁ra ap ▁mua at ▁a aring ▁kupi ▁u ▁ra ▁ia ang . </s> rai_Latn

▁Baa ▁mua at ▁anu ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al , ▁io , ▁a ▁rak raka an ▁bua al ▁in ▁maari ▁mua at ▁wela ar ▁ma ▁mua at ▁an una . ▁I aku ▁mua at ▁wak ir ▁anu ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al , ▁maa ▁ia au ▁aa ▁pi lak ▁pa ▁mua at ▁koni . ▁Bi ▁ia ▁a ▁kab ina ▁baa ▁i ▁mili kua ana ▁mua at . </s> rai_Latn
▁Mua at ▁a ▁nuk ▁paa ▁a ▁pir pir ▁baa ▁ia au ▁aa ▁pir ▁ta ai ▁taa ▁mua at ▁len bi , ▁' A ▁t ult ul ▁pa ▁i ▁nga ala ▁taa ▁ra ▁nuna ▁tada aru .' ▁Baa ▁diat ▁baana akaka ▁ia au , ▁diat ▁a ▁baana akaka ▁mua at ▁ka ai . ▁Baa ▁diat ▁tara am ▁u ▁ra ▁nung ▁pir pir , ▁diat ▁a ▁tara am ▁ka ai ▁u ▁ra ▁num ua at ▁pir pir . </s> rai_Latn
▁Di at ▁a ▁baana akaka ▁mua at ▁kab ina ▁u ▁ra ▁ia ang , ▁maa ▁pa ▁diat ▁nun ura ▁ia ▁baa ▁i ▁tula ▁wa ▁ia au ▁urin . </s> rai_Latn
▁" B aa ▁gun ▁pang ▁waan ▁pa at ▁ma ▁pang ▁pir pir ▁kar om ▁diat , ▁io , ▁pa ▁din ▁tak una ▁diat ▁u ▁ra ▁nun diat ▁kum ▁a aka ina ▁mang amanga an , ▁ma ▁diat ▁a ▁la angala anga . ▁I aku ▁mi , ▁pa ▁nun diat ▁ta ▁pir pir ▁kupi ▁diat ▁a ▁pir ▁baat ▁diat ▁mai ▁ko ▁ra ▁nun diat ▁a aka ina ▁mang amanga an . </s> rai_Latn
▁Ia ▁baa ▁i ▁mili kua ana ▁ia au , ▁i ▁mili kua ana ▁ut ka ai ▁Tama ang . </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁gun ▁pa ▁ia au ▁paam ▁taa ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁na ▁kaka ian ▁naan ▁diat ▁baa ▁pain ▁te ▁in ▁paam ▁la ar ▁paai , ▁pa ▁din ▁tak una ▁diat ▁u ▁ra ▁nun diat ▁kum ▁a aka ina ▁mang amanga an ▁ma ▁diat ▁a ▁la angala anga . ▁Ma ▁mi , ▁diat ▁aa ▁babo ▁taa ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁na ▁kaka ian ▁baa ▁ia au ▁pa ami , ▁i aku ▁diat ▁mili kua ana ▁ut ▁mir ▁ra ap ▁ma ▁Tama ang . </s> rai_Latn
▁Di ▁pa ami ▁len mi , ▁kupi ▁din ▁paam ▁ot ▁paa ▁a ▁pir pir ▁di ▁aa ▁timu ▁ta ai ▁u ▁ra ▁Buk ▁na ▁Na aga gon ▁baa , ▁' Di at ▁mili kua ana ▁ia au , ▁ma ▁pa ▁ta ▁kab ina .' </s> rai_Latn
▁" Ang ▁tula ▁wa ▁a ▁Tena ▁We wara aut ▁kar om ▁mua at ▁kon ▁Tama ang , ▁ia ▁a ▁Tak ado ▁na ▁Ni on ▁baa ▁in ▁wap ua ana ▁a ▁ling tat una . ▁Baa ▁in ▁waan ▁pa at ▁in ▁we wap ua ▁un ▁ia au . </s> rai_Latn
▁Ma ▁mua at ▁ka ai ▁mua at ▁a ▁we wap ua ▁un ▁ia au , ▁kab ina ▁mua at ▁ki ▁unga ai ▁ma ▁ia au ▁ko ▁ra ▁tur tur pa ai ▁ra ▁nung ▁pin apa am ▁tuk ▁mi . </s> rai_Latn
▁" I aa u ▁pir ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁mi ▁taa ▁mua at ▁kupi ▁koku ▁anum ua at ▁nur nur ▁in ▁puka . </s> rai_Latn
▁Di at ▁a ▁tur ba at ▁mua at ▁ko ▁ra ▁kum ▁ruma ▁na ▁lotu . ▁Nam ur ▁a ▁paka ana ▁bung ▁in ▁waan ▁pa at , ▁baa ▁diat ▁baa ▁diat ▁aak ▁doko ▁mua at , ▁diat ▁a ▁nuk i ▁naa ▁diat ▁paam ▁ut ▁a ▁pin apa am ▁anun ▁God . </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁taara ▁diat ▁a ▁paam ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁mi ▁kar om ▁mua at , ▁kab ina ▁maa ▁pa ▁diat ▁nun ura ▁mir ▁ma ▁Tama ang . </s> rai_Latn
▁I aa u ▁pir ▁taa ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁mi ▁taa ▁mua at , ▁kupi ▁baa ▁a ▁paka ana ▁bung ▁maa ▁in ▁waan ▁pa at , ▁mua at ▁a ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁ia au ▁aa ▁wakat om ▁muga ▁ta ▁mua at ▁uni . ▁" Pa ▁ia au ▁pir ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁mi ▁taa ▁mua at ▁u ▁ra ▁tur tur pa ai ▁ra ▁nung ▁pin apa am , ▁kab ina ▁maa ▁ia au ▁ki ▁unga ai ▁ut ba ai ▁ma ▁mua at . </s> rai_Latn
▁Io ▁mi , ▁ang ▁waan ▁kar om ▁ia ▁baa ▁i ▁tula ▁wa ▁ia au ▁urin . ▁I aku ▁maa ▁pa ▁te ▁kon ▁mua at ▁i ▁tiri ▁ia au ▁naa , ▁' Un ▁waan ▁uwa ai ?' </s> rai_Latn
▁Mua at ▁ta pun uk ▁a akit ▁baa ▁ia au ▁pir ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁mi ▁taa ▁mua at . </s> rai_Latn
▁I aa u ▁pir ▁a ▁ling tat una ▁taa ▁mua at ▁naa , ▁in ▁ko ina ▁kar om ▁mua at ▁baa ▁ang ▁waan . ▁Baa ▁pang ▁waan , ▁a ▁Tena ▁We wara aut ▁pa ▁in ▁waan ▁pa at ▁kar om ▁mua at . ▁I aku ▁baa ▁ang ▁waan , ▁io , ▁ang ▁tula ▁wai ▁urin ▁kar om ▁mua at . </s> rai_Latn
▁" Io , ▁baa ▁in ▁waan ▁pa at , ▁in ▁wa iaa ▁a ▁taara ▁u ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al ▁naa ▁pa ▁diat ▁nun ura ▁lele ▁a ▁mang amanga an ▁a aka ina , ▁ma ▁ra ▁mang amanga an ▁na ▁tak ado ▁ma ▁ra ▁na aga gon ▁anun ▁God . </s> rai_Latn
▁In ▁wa iaa ▁diat ▁naa ▁baa ▁pa ▁diat ▁nur nur ▁un ▁ia au , ▁bi ▁ia ▁an undi at ▁a aka ina ▁mang amanga an . </s> rai_Latn
▁Ma ▁in ▁wa iaa ▁diat ▁ka ai ▁naa ▁ia au ▁ut ▁a ▁kabi ▁ra ▁tak ado ▁na ▁mang amanga an , ▁maa ▁ang ▁waan ▁kar om ▁Tama ang ▁ma ▁pa ▁mua at ▁a ▁babo ▁ia au ▁balet ▁ma . </s> rai_Latn
▁Ma ▁in ▁wa iaa ▁diat ▁ka ai ▁naa ▁God ▁ia ▁na aga gon ▁taa ▁a ▁tada aru ▁i ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al , ▁ma ▁ia ▁uw ia ▁paai . </s> rai_Latn
▁" M ong oro ▁na ▁ut naa ▁baa ▁ang ▁piri ▁taa ▁mua at , ▁i aku ▁pa ▁i ▁tale ▁mua at ▁ut ba ai ▁kupi ▁mua at ▁a ▁nun ura ▁lelei . </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁a ▁Tak ado ▁na ▁Ni on ▁baa ▁i ▁wap ua ana ▁a ▁ling tat una ▁in ▁waan ▁pa at , ▁in ▁waka apa ▁mua at ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁ling tat una ▁ra ap ▁un ▁God . ▁Maa ▁a ▁kum ▁pir pir ▁baa ▁in ▁piri ▁wak ir ▁an una , ▁in ▁pir ▁ku ▁a ▁kum ▁pir pir ▁baa ▁i ▁walang oro i , ▁ma ▁in ▁wap ua ▁mua at ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁baa ▁in ▁waan ▁pa at ▁nam ur . </s> rai_Latn
▁In ▁taar ▁a ▁min ama ar ▁kar om ▁ia au , ▁baa ▁i ▁lolo ▁paa ▁an ung ▁pir pir , ▁ma ▁in ▁wap ua ▁mua at ▁uni . </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁ra ap ▁baa ▁anun ▁Tama ang , ▁an ung , ▁maa ▁ia ▁kab ina ▁baa ▁ia au ▁piri ▁naa ▁a ▁Tak ado ▁na ▁Ni on ▁in ▁lolo ▁paa ▁an ung ▁pir pir ▁ma ▁in ▁wap ua ▁mua at ▁uni . </s> rai_Latn
▁" Pa ▁in ▁iwan ▁ku , ▁ma ▁pa ▁mua at ▁a ▁babo ▁ia au ▁ma . ▁Ma ▁pa ▁in ▁iwan ▁balet ▁ku , ▁mua at ▁a ▁babo ▁ia au ▁balet . " </s> rai_Latn
▁An una ▁raa ▁kum ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer ▁diat ▁tiri ▁wet wet ala ai ▁diat ▁naa , ▁" A awa ▁kukura ai ▁ra ▁nuna ▁pir pir ▁mi ▁baa ▁i ▁piri ▁naa , ▁pa ▁in ▁iwan ▁ku ▁ma ▁pa ▁da at ▁a ▁babo i ▁ma , ▁ma ▁pa ▁in ▁iwan ▁balet ▁ku ▁da at ▁a ▁babo i ▁balet ? ▁Ma ▁i ▁piri ▁ka ai ▁len bi , ▁' Kab ina ▁ang ▁waan ▁kar om ▁Tama ang '. </s> rai_Latn
▁A awa ▁kuk uraa ina ▁maa ▁i ▁piri ▁naa ▁' pa ▁in ▁iwan '? ▁Pa ▁da at ▁nun ura ▁a ▁ut naa ▁mi ▁i ▁pir pir ▁uni !" </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁diat ▁nem ▁na ▁tiri , ▁io , ▁i ▁piri ▁kar om ▁diat , ▁" I aa u ▁piri ▁naa , ▁' Pa ▁in ▁iwan ▁ku ▁baa ▁pa ▁mua at ▁a ▁babo ▁ia au ▁ma , ▁ma ▁pa ▁in ▁iwan ▁balet ▁ku ▁mua at ▁a ▁babo ▁ia au ▁balet .' ▁Mi ▁ia ▁a ▁pir pir ▁baa ▁mua at ▁tiri ▁wet wet ala ai ▁mua at ▁uni ? </s> rai_Latn
▁I aa u ▁pir ▁a ▁ling tat una ▁taa ▁mua at , ▁mua at ▁a ▁ta pun uk ▁ma ▁mua at ▁a ▁ta angi , ▁i aku ▁a ▁rak raka an ▁bua al ▁in ▁gaa ia . ▁Mua at ▁a ▁ta pun uk , ▁i aku ▁nam ur ▁din ▁kia ana ▁anum ua at ▁ta pun uk ▁ma ▁ra ▁gaa ia . </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁tabu an ▁baa ▁i ▁mara wa ai ▁kupi ▁in ▁ba buta , ▁i ▁ta pun uk ▁kab ina ▁maa ▁i ▁kar ia ana ▁a ▁ng unung ut . ▁I aku , ▁baa ▁ia ▁ba buta ▁paa , ▁i ▁gaa ia , ▁maa ▁ia ▁buta ▁taa ▁a ▁naat ▁urin ▁u ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al , ▁ma ▁an una ▁ta pun uk ▁i ▁ra ap . </s> rai_Latn
▁Len ka ai ▁maa ▁kar om ▁mua at , ▁mi ▁mua at ▁ta pun uk , ▁i aku ▁ang ▁babo ▁mua at ▁balet , ▁ma ▁mua at ▁a ▁gaa ia . ▁A ▁manga ana ▁gaa ia ▁mi , ▁pa ▁te ▁in ▁pet ▁la ar ▁paai ▁kupi ▁in ▁raka an ▁wai ▁kon ▁mua at . </s> rai_Latn
▁" U ▁ra ▁bung ▁maa , ▁pa ▁mua at ▁a ▁tiri ▁ia au ▁balet ▁ma ▁un ▁ta ▁ut naa . ▁I aa u ▁pir ▁a ▁ling tat una ▁taa ▁mua at , ▁Tama ang ▁in ▁taba ara ▁mua at ▁ma ▁ra ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁baa ▁mua at ▁aar ingi ▁koni ▁u ▁ra ▁ia ang . </s> rai_Latn
▁Tuk ▁mi , ▁pa ▁mua at ▁a aring ▁ut ba ai ▁kup ▁ta ▁ut naa ▁u ▁ra ▁ia ang . ▁I aku ▁nam ur ▁mua at ▁a ▁a ara aring ▁ma ▁din ▁taba ara ▁mua at , ▁kupi ▁anum ua at ▁gaa ia ▁in ▁teng ▁u ▁ra ▁num ua at ▁lalaa un . </s> rai_Latn
▁" I aa u ▁pir ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁mi ▁taa ▁mua at ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁pir pir ▁wel wela ar , ▁i aku ▁a ▁paka ana ▁bung ▁in ▁waan ▁pa at ▁baa ▁pang ▁pir pir ▁balet ▁ma ▁kar om ▁mua at ▁ma ▁ra ▁pir pir ▁wel wela ar , ▁ang ▁wap ua ▁ka apa ▁mulu ▁mua at ▁ma ▁un ▁Tama ang . </s> rai_Latn
▁U ▁ra ▁kum ▁bung bung ▁maa , ▁mua at ▁a ▁a ara aring ▁u ▁ra ▁ia ang . ▁Pa ▁ia au ▁piri ▁naa ▁ang ▁a aring ▁Tama ang ▁kupi ▁in ▁wara aut ▁mua at , </s> rai_Latn
▁maa ▁Tama ang ▁ut ▁i ▁maari ▁mua at . ▁I ▁maari ▁mua at ▁kab ina ▁mua at ▁maari ▁ia au , ▁ma ▁mua at ▁nur nur ▁baa ▁ia au ▁waan ▁pa at ▁kon ▁God . </s> rai_Latn
▁I aa u ▁aa ▁waan ▁paa ▁kon ▁Tama ang , ▁ma ▁ia au ▁waan ▁urin ▁u ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al . ▁Ma ▁mi , ▁ang ▁waan ▁ma ▁ko ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al , ▁ang ▁waan ▁balet ▁kup ▁Tama ang . " </s> rai_Latn
▁An una ▁kum ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer ▁diat ▁piri ▁ta ana ▁naa , ▁" Mi ▁pa ▁u ▁pir pir ▁ma ▁ma ▁ra ▁pir pir ▁wel wela ar , ▁u ▁pir pir ▁ka apa ▁mulu ▁mara aga am . </s> rai_Latn
▁Mi ▁mia at ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁u ▁nun ura ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁ra ap . ▁Pa ▁u ▁iba ▁kup ▁te ▁in ▁tiri ▁ui ▁ma ▁ta ▁wet iri , ▁maa ▁u ▁aa ▁nun ura ▁a ▁nuk nuk imia at ▁ra ap . ▁Mi ▁mia at ▁nur nur ▁mara aga am ▁baa ▁u ▁waan ▁paa ▁ut ▁kon ▁God . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁piri ▁taan ▁diat ▁naa , ▁" Ni , ▁mua at ▁nur nur ▁mara aga am ? </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁paka ana ▁bung ▁in ▁waan ▁pa at , ▁ma ▁mi ▁ia ▁waan ▁pa at , ▁baa ▁din ▁lu ▁wer wera ana ▁wa ▁mua at ▁kon ▁ia au , ▁ma ▁mua at ▁a ▁waan ▁wer wera an ▁kup ▁anum ua at ▁kum ▁ta amta amaan , ▁ma ▁ia au ▁maku ▁ang ▁ki . ▁I aku ▁wak ir ▁ia au ▁ku ▁maa ▁ang ▁ki , ▁mir ▁ut ▁ma ▁Tama ang . </s> rai_Latn
▁" I aa u ▁pir ▁a ▁kum ▁pir pir ▁mi ▁taa ▁mua at ▁kupi ▁mua at ▁a ▁lalaa un ▁un ▁ia au , ▁ma ▁mua at ▁a ▁paam ▁ak oto ▁a ▁maal maal . ▁Main ▁u ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al , ▁mua at ▁a ▁kar ia ana ▁a ▁mawa at . ▁I aku ▁koku ▁mua at ▁bur ut , ▁maa ▁ia au ▁aa ▁uw ia ▁paa ▁a ▁rak raka an ▁bua al . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁Iesu ▁ia ▁pir ▁ara ap ▁wa ▁a ▁kum ▁pir pir ▁mi , ▁i ▁babo ▁tato ▁una anga ▁u ▁ra ▁maa wa , ▁ma ▁i ▁piri ▁naa , ▁" T ama ang , ▁a ▁paka ana ▁bung ▁ia ▁waan ▁pa at , ▁un ▁taar ▁a ▁min ama ar ▁kar om ▁Nat um , ▁kupi ▁Nat um ▁in ▁taar ▁a ▁min ama ar ▁kar om ▁ui . </s> rai_Latn
▁U ▁taar ▁taa ▁a ▁na aga gon ▁ta ang ▁kup ▁a ▁taara ▁ra ap , ▁kupi ▁ang ▁taar ▁a ▁lalaa un ▁tak um ▁kar om ▁diat ▁ra ap ▁baa ▁u ▁taar ▁ta ▁diat ▁ta ang . </s> rai_Latn
▁Bi ▁ia ▁a ▁lalaa un ▁tak um ▁baa ▁a ▁taara ▁diat ▁a ▁nun ura ▁ui , ▁baa ▁ui ▁ku ▁a ▁God ▁ling tat una , ▁ma ▁diat ▁a ▁nun ura ▁ka ai ▁Iesu ▁Ka arisito , ▁baa ▁u ▁tula ▁wai ▁urin . </s> rai_Latn
▁I aa u ▁aa ▁wa iaa ▁taa ▁a ▁min ama arim ▁min ▁u ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al , ▁baa ▁ia au ▁paam ▁ot ▁paa ▁a ▁kum ▁pin apa am ▁baa ▁u ▁tula ▁wa ▁ia au ▁mai ▁kupi ▁ang ▁pa ami . </s> rai_Latn
▁Tama ang , ▁mi ▁un ▁taar ▁a ▁min ama ar ▁ta ang , ▁baa ▁ang ▁ki ▁unga ai ▁balet ▁ma ▁ui . ▁A ▁min ama ar ▁maa ▁namu ga ▁ia au ▁ki ▁uni ▁unga ai ▁ma ▁ui , ▁baa ▁pa ▁di ▁waki ▁ut ba ai ▁a ▁rak raka an ▁bua al . </s> rai_Latn
▁" Di at ▁baa ▁u ▁aa ▁pi lak ▁pa ▁diat ▁ko ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al , ▁ma ▁u ▁taar ▁ta ▁diat ▁ta ang , ▁ia au ▁aa ▁pir ▁wa iaa ▁ta ▁ui ▁taan ▁diat . ▁Di at ▁anum ▁ma ▁u ▁taar ▁ta ▁diat ▁ta ang , ▁ma ▁diat ▁aa ▁tara am ▁u ▁ra ▁num ▁kum ▁pir pir . </s> rai_Latn
▁Mi ▁diat ▁aa ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁a ▁kum ▁pir pir ▁ra ap ▁u ▁taar ▁ta ai ▁ta ang , ▁i ▁waan ▁pa at ▁ling tat una ▁paa ▁ut ▁kon ▁ui . </s> rai_Latn
▁I aa u ▁aa ▁wap ua ▁ta ▁diat ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁pir pir ▁u ▁taar ▁ta ai ▁ta ang , ▁ma ▁diat ▁aa ▁tara am ▁uni . ▁Ma ▁diat ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁ia au ▁waan ▁paa ▁ut ▁kon ▁ui , ▁ma ▁diat ▁aa ▁nur nur ▁baa ▁ui ▁ut ▁u ▁tula ▁wa ▁ia au ▁urin . </s> rai_Latn
▁" Mi ▁ia au ▁a ara aring ▁un ▁diat . ▁Wak ir ▁ia au ▁a ara aring ▁u ▁ra ▁taara ▁ko ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al , ▁i aku ▁ia au ▁a ara aring ▁un ▁diat ▁baa ▁u ▁taar ▁ta ▁diat ▁ta ang , ▁kab ina ▁maa ▁diat ▁anum . </s> rai_Latn
▁Di at ▁baa ▁an ung , ▁diat ▁anum ▁ut ka ai , ▁ma ▁diat ▁baa ▁anum , ▁diat ▁an ung ▁ut ka ai . ▁Ma ▁din ▁babo ▁an ung ▁min ama ar ▁un ▁diat . </s> rai_Latn
▁Mi ▁ang ▁waan ▁kar om ▁ui , ▁pang ▁ki ▁iwan ▁balet ▁ma ▁u ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al , ▁i aku ▁diat , ▁kuri ▁ut ba ai ▁diat ▁u ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al . ▁Tama ang ▁u ▁gom gom ▁a akit , ▁un ▁babo ura ▁baat ▁diat ▁ma ▁ra ▁dek dek ▁i ▁ra ▁ia am , ▁a ▁ia am ▁baa ▁u ▁taar ▁ta ai ▁ta ang , ▁kupi ▁diat ▁a ▁raa ▁ku , ▁wela ar ▁ma ▁ui ▁ma ▁ia au , ▁daar ▁raa ▁ku . </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁ia au ▁ki ▁unga ai ▁ma ▁diat , ▁ia au ▁babo ura ▁baat ▁diat ▁ma ▁ra ▁dek dek ▁i ▁ra ▁ia am , ▁a ▁ia am ▁baa ▁u ▁taar ▁ta ai ▁ta ang . ▁I aa u ▁babo ura ▁baat ▁diat , ▁ma ▁pa ▁te ▁kon ▁diat ▁i ▁wir ua . ▁Raa ▁ot ▁ku ▁in ▁wir ua , ▁I uda as , ▁ia ▁baa ▁a ▁natu ▁ra ▁win irua ▁tak um . ▁Len maa , ▁a ▁pir pir ▁di ▁aa ▁timu ▁ta ai ▁u ▁ra ▁Buk ▁Ta abu ▁in ▁waan ▁pa at ▁ling tat una . </s> rai_Latn
▁" Mi ▁ang ▁waan ▁kar om ▁ui , ▁i aku ▁ia au ▁pir ▁a ▁kum ▁pir pir ▁mi ▁baa ▁ia au ▁ki ▁ut ba ai ▁main ▁u ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al , ▁kupi ▁an ung ▁nga ala ▁na ▁gaa ia ▁in ▁wat eng ▁an undi at ▁lalaa un . </s> rai_Latn
▁I aa u ▁aa ▁pir ▁taa ▁anum ▁kum ▁pir pir ▁taan ▁diat , ▁ma ▁a ▁rak raka an ▁bua al ▁i ▁mili kua ana ▁diat , ▁kab ina ▁wak ir ▁balet ▁ma ▁diat ▁ta anga ▁min ▁u ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al , ▁wela ar ▁ma ▁ia au ▁ka ai , ▁wak ir ▁ia au ▁ta anga ▁min ▁u ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al . </s> rai_Latn
▁Pa ▁ia au ▁a aring ▁ui ▁kupi ▁un ▁raka an ▁wa ▁diat ▁ko ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al , ▁pate . ▁I aku ▁ia au ▁a aring ▁ui ▁kupi ▁un ▁babo ura ▁baat ▁diat ▁ko ▁ra ▁Tena ▁A aka ina . </s> rai_Latn
▁Wak ir ▁ia au ▁ta anga ▁min ▁u ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al , ▁io , ▁diat ▁ka ai ▁wak ir ▁diat ▁ta anga ▁min ▁u ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al . </s> rai_Latn
▁An um ▁pir pir ▁i ▁ling tat una . ▁Un ▁wag om gom ▁diat ▁ma ▁ra ▁num ▁ling tat una ▁na ▁pir pir ▁kupi ▁diat ▁anum ▁taara ▁mulu . </s> rai_Latn
▁W ela ar ▁ma ▁u ▁tula ▁wa ▁ia au ▁urin ▁u ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al , ▁len ka ai ▁maa ▁ia au ▁tula ▁wa ▁diat ▁u ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al . </s> rai_Latn
▁I aa u ▁taar ▁ta ▁ia au ▁ta am , ▁kupi ▁diat ▁ka ai ▁diat ▁a ▁gom gom ▁ma ▁ra ▁num ▁ling tat una ▁na ▁pir pir ▁kupi ▁diat ▁anum ▁taara ▁mulu . </s> rai_Latn
▁" W akir ▁ia au ▁a ara aring ▁ku ▁un ▁diat , ▁ia au ▁a ara aring ▁ut ka ai ▁un ▁diat ▁baa ▁nam ur ▁diat ▁a ▁nur nur ▁un ▁ia au , ▁baa ▁a ▁kum ▁tena ▁nur nur ▁diat ▁a ▁we wap ua ▁un ▁ia au . </s> rai_Latn
▁I aa u ▁a ara aring ▁baa ▁diat ▁ra ap ▁baa ▁diat ▁nur nur ▁un ▁ia au , ▁diat ▁a ▁raa ▁ku . ▁Tama ang , ▁wela ar ▁ma ▁u ▁ki ▁un ▁ia au ▁ma ▁ia au ▁ki ▁un ▁ui , ▁i ▁ko ina ▁baa ▁diat ▁ma ▁daar , ▁da at ▁a ▁raa ▁ku , ▁kupi ▁a ▁taara ▁u ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al ▁diat ▁a ▁nur nur ▁naa ▁u ▁tula ▁wa ▁ia au ▁urin . </s> rai_Latn
▁I aa u ▁taar ▁taa ▁a ▁min ama ar ▁taan ▁diat , ▁a ▁min ama ar ▁baa ▁u ▁taar ▁ta ai ▁ta ang , ▁kupi ▁diat ▁a ▁raa ▁ku , ▁wela ar ▁ma ▁daar , ▁daar ▁raa ▁ku . </s> rai_Latn
▁I aa u ▁ki ▁un ▁diat , ▁ma ▁ui ▁ka ai ▁u ▁ki ▁un ▁ia au , ▁kupi ▁diat ▁a ▁raa ▁maku , ▁kupi ▁a ▁taara ▁u ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al ▁diat ▁a ▁nun urai ▁ka ai ▁naa ▁u ▁tula ▁wa ▁ia au ▁urin , ▁ma ▁diat ▁a ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁u ▁maari ▁diat ▁wela ar ▁ma ▁u ▁maari ▁ia au . </s> rai_Latn
▁" T ama ang , ▁ia au ▁nemi ▁naa ▁diat ▁baa ▁u ▁aa ▁taar ▁ta ▁diat ▁ta ang , ▁diat ▁a ▁ki ▁unga ai ▁ma ▁ia au ▁u ▁ra ▁ta amaan ▁baa ▁ang ▁ki ▁ia ai , ▁kupi ▁diat ▁a ▁babo ▁an ung ▁min ama ar , ▁a ▁min ama ar ▁u ▁taar ▁ta ai ▁ta ang , ▁kab ina ▁u ▁maari ▁ia au ▁namu ga ▁ut ba ai ▁baa ▁pa ▁di ▁waki ▁ut ba ai ▁a ▁rak raka an ▁bua al . </s> rai_Latn
▁Tama ang , ▁ui ▁a ▁Tena ▁Tak ado , ▁a ▁taara ▁u ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al ▁pa ▁diat ▁nun ura ▁ui , ▁i aku ▁ia au , ▁ia au ▁nun ura ▁ui , ▁ma ▁an ung ▁taara ▁na ▁wa wer ▁diat ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁u ▁tula ▁wa ▁ia au ▁urin . </s> rai_Latn
▁I aa u ▁aa ▁pir ▁wa iaa ▁ta ▁ui ▁kar om ▁diat , ▁ma ▁pang ▁ngo ▁ma ▁ra ▁we wap ua ▁kar om ▁diat , ▁kupi ▁diat ▁a ▁nun ura ▁ui , ▁ma ▁a ▁maar ma ari ▁baa ▁u ▁maari ▁ia au ▁mai , ▁in ▁ki ▁kar om ▁diat ▁ma ▁ia au ▁ang ▁ki ▁un ▁diat . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁Iesu ▁ia ▁a ara aring ▁paa , ▁i ▁ben ▁paa ▁an una ▁kum ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer , ▁ma ▁diat ▁waan ▁bolo ▁u ▁ra ▁naat ▁na ▁da anim ▁Ked ron . ▁Baa ▁diat ▁waan ▁bolo , ▁diat ▁waan ▁ruk ▁un ▁raa ▁wan ua ▁na ▁diwa ai ▁na ▁oli wa . </s> rai_Latn
▁I uda as , ▁ia ▁baa ▁i ▁w agu ▁taa ▁Iesu , ▁i ▁nun ura ▁a ▁wan ua ▁maa , ▁kab ina ▁mong oro ▁na ▁paka an ▁Iesu ▁ma ▁ra ▁nuna ▁kum ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer ▁diat ▁la ana ▁waan ▁unga ai ▁ia ai . </s> rai_Latn
▁Io , ▁I uda as ▁i ▁muga ▁paa ▁a ▁kum ▁tena ▁w inei um ▁anu ▁ra ▁taara ▁Rom , ▁ma ▁ra ▁kum ▁tena ▁babo ura ▁ko ▁ra ▁ruma ▁na ▁w eta baar . ▁A ▁kum ▁nga ala ▁na ▁tena ▁w eta baar ▁ma ▁ra ▁kum ▁Par isa ai o ▁diat ▁tula ▁wa ▁diat . ▁Di at ▁lo ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁na ▁w inei um , ▁a ▁kum ▁la am ▁ma ▁ra ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁baa ▁i ▁kup ▁baa ▁diat ▁ulu ▁a ara ▁diat ▁mai . </s> rai_Latn
▁I aku ▁Iesu ▁ia ▁nun ura ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁ra ap ▁baa ▁in ▁waan ▁pa at ▁kar omi , ▁io , ▁i ▁waan ▁kar om ▁diat ▁ma ▁i ▁tiri ▁diat ▁naa , ▁" W oi ▁maa ▁mua at ▁baat ▁kupi ?" </s> rai_Latn
▁Di at ▁baal ui ▁naa , ▁" I esu ▁a ▁te ▁Na asar et . " ▁Iesu ▁i ▁piri ▁naa , ▁" Mi ▁ut ▁ia au . " ▁Ma ▁I uda as , ▁a ▁tena ▁wawa gu ▁kura a ▁ut ▁i ▁tur ▁unga ai ▁ma ▁diat . </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁Iesu ▁i ▁wap ua ▁diat ▁naa , ▁" Mi ▁ut ▁ia au , " ▁diat ▁ki ▁we wa ▁un amur , ▁ma ▁diat ▁kat uk ▁unap ia . </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁tiri ▁diat ▁balet ▁naa , ▁" W oi ▁maa ▁mua at ▁baat ▁kupi ?" ▁Di at ▁baal ui ▁naa , ▁" I esu ▁a ▁te ▁Na asar et . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁ba alu ▁diat ▁naa , ▁" I aa u ▁aa ▁pir ▁ta ai ▁taa ▁mua at ▁naa , ▁mi ▁ut ▁ia au . ▁Baa ▁mua at ▁baat ▁ut ▁kup ▁ia au , ▁io , ▁mua at ▁a ▁ma adek ▁wa ▁diat ▁bi ▁diat ▁a ▁waan . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁Iesu ▁i ▁piri ▁len mi ▁di ▁paam ▁ot ▁paa ▁a ▁pir pir ▁baa ▁ia ▁pir ▁ta ai ▁naa , ▁" T ama ang , ▁diat ▁ra ap ▁baa ▁u ▁taar ▁ta ▁diat ▁ta ang , ▁pa ▁te ▁kon ▁diat ▁i ▁wir ua . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Simon ▁Petero ▁i ▁lo ▁ut ▁an una ▁in ▁li wan ▁na ▁w inei um . ▁I ▁a alum ▁paai ▁ma ▁i ▁paka at ▁kutu ▁wa ▁ina ▁ot ▁na ▁tal inga an ▁Maal ko . ▁Maal ko , ▁ia ▁raa ▁t ult ul ▁anu ▁ra ▁muk mu ga ▁na ▁tena ▁w eta baar ▁kar om ▁God . </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁piri ▁taan ▁Petero ▁naa , ▁" War uk ▁balet ▁anum ▁in ▁li wan ▁u ▁ra ▁baana . ▁Lela wa ai , ▁pang ▁paam ▁ot ▁paa ▁a ▁pin apa am ▁baa ▁Tama ang ▁i ▁taar ▁ta ai ▁ta ang ?" </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁kum ▁tena ▁w inei um ▁ta ang ir ong ▁Rom ▁unga ai ▁ma ▁ra ▁nun diat ▁muk mu ga , ▁ma ▁ra ▁kum ▁tena ▁babo ura ▁ko ▁ra ▁ruma ▁na ▁w eta baar ▁anu ▁ra ▁taara ▁I uda ia , ▁diat ▁paam ▁ak oto ▁paa ▁Iesu , ▁ma ▁diat ▁wi ▁paa ▁a ▁ru ▁lima ana . </s> rai_Latn
▁Ma ▁diat ▁ben ▁mu gai ▁kar om ▁A ana as , ▁ia ▁baa ▁dia ar ▁nim una ▁ma ▁Kaa iapa as , ▁a ▁muk mu ga ▁na ▁tena ▁w eta baar ▁kar om ▁God ▁u ▁ra ▁kila ala ▁maa . </s> rai_Latn
▁Kaa iapa as , ▁ia ▁baa ▁i ▁piri ▁kar om ▁a ▁kum ▁te ▁I uda ia ▁naa ▁i ▁ko ina ▁baa ▁te ▁in ▁maat ▁baat ▁a ▁taara ▁ra ap . </s> rai_Latn
▁Simon ▁Petero ▁ma ▁raa ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer ▁ka ai ▁dia ar ▁mur mur ▁Iesu . ▁Ma ▁a ▁muk mu ga ▁na ▁tena ▁w eta baar ▁i ▁nun ura ▁waka ak ▁a ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer ▁baa ▁dia ar ▁we ur ▁ma ▁Petero . ▁A ▁naat ▁maa ▁i ▁ruk ▁unga ai ▁ma ▁Iesu ▁una anga ▁u ▁ra ▁paka ana ▁anu ▁ra ▁tena ▁w eta baar ▁maa . </s> rai_Latn
▁Petero ▁kura a ▁ut ba ai ▁i ▁tur tur ▁nata amaan ▁naa ▁ra ▁bon ana aka . ▁Io , ▁a ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer ▁baa ▁a ▁muk mu ga ▁i ▁nun urai , ▁i ▁waan ▁tali li ▁balet , ▁ma ▁i ▁pir pir ▁kar om ▁a ▁taura ara ▁baa ▁i ▁babo ura ▁a ▁bon ana aka , ▁kupi ▁in ▁pa apa ▁a ara ▁paa ▁Petero . </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁taura ara ▁baa ▁i ▁babo ura ▁a ▁bon ana aka ▁i ▁tiri ▁Petero ▁naa , ▁" A ai , ▁ui ▁ka ai ▁raa ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer ▁anu ▁ra ▁mua ana ▁mi , ▁ni ?" ▁Petero ▁i ▁baal ui ▁naa , ▁" P ate , ▁ia au ▁pate . " </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁bung ▁na ▁mar um ▁maa ▁i ▁mad iring ▁a akit . ▁Io , ▁a ▁kum ▁t ult ul ▁ma ▁ra ▁kum ▁tena ▁babo ura ▁ko ▁ra ▁ruma ▁na ▁w eta baar ▁diat ▁waka a ▁paa ▁a ▁nguan , ▁diat ▁tur ▁lili ▁paai ▁ma ▁diat ▁man iri . ▁Petero ▁ka ai ▁i ▁tur ▁unga ai ▁ma ▁diat ▁ma ▁i ▁man ir . </s> rai_Latn

▁Pila ato ▁i ▁piri ▁ta ana ▁naa , ▁" A awa ▁kab ina ▁maa ▁pa ▁u ▁ba alu ▁ia au ? ▁Pa ▁u ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁ia au ▁paam ▁ak oto ▁a ▁na aga gon ▁kupi ▁ang ▁wala angala anga ▁wa ▁ui , ▁baa ▁ang ▁aak ▁wa at ▁ui ▁u ▁ra ▁bolo ?" </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁ba alu ▁Pila ato ▁naa , ▁" U i ▁pa ▁ta ▁dek dek im ▁un ▁ia au , ▁baa ▁God ▁pa ▁in ▁taar ▁taa ▁a ▁na aga gon ▁ta am ▁ta ang ina anga ▁nate . ▁I aku ▁mi , ▁ia ▁baa ▁i ▁taar ▁ta ▁ia au ▁ta am ▁kupi ▁un ▁na aga gon ▁ia au , ▁an una ▁a aka ina ▁in ▁a aka ▁a akit ▁ta am . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁Iesu ▁i ▁pir ▁ta ai ▁len maa , ▁Pila ato ▁i ▁wala ari ▁kupi ▁in ▁wala angala anga ▁wai . ▁I aku ▁a ▁kum ▁te ▁I uda ia ▁diat ▁pir pir ▁dek dek ▁kar omi ▁naa , ▁" B aa ▁un ▁pa laa ▁wai , ▁pa ▁mur ▁tepa ana ▁ma ▁ma ▁ra ▁Kaa isa ar ! ▁Maa ▁te ▁baa ▁i ▁kaba anga ▁paai ▁naa ▁ia ▁a ▁king , ▁i ▁bub ur ▁a ▁na aga gon ▁anu ▁ra ▁Kaa isa ar . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁Pila ato ▁i ▁walang oro ▁a ▁kum ▁pir pir ▁mi , ▁i ▁ben ▁apari ▁paa ▁Iesu ▁un ata amaan . ▁Nam ur ▁Pila ato ▁i ▁ki ▁ta au ▁u ▁ra ▁kiki ▁na ▁na aga gon ▁u ▁ra ▁paka ana ▁di ▁wa at ungi ▁u ▁ra ▁pir pir ▁E bra ai o ▁ma ▁Gaba ata , ▁a ▁kuk uraa ina ▁naa ▁di ▁ung ▁baat ▁a ▁pia ▁ma ▁ra ▁kum ▁wa at waat . </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁in ▁mage ▁i ▁aak laku a , ▁Pila ato ▁i ▁piri ▁taa ▁ra ▁taara ▁I uda ia ▁naa , ▁" M ua at ▁babo i , ▁anum ua at ▁king ▁bari ▁ia . " ▁A ▁ut naa ▁mi ▁i ▁waan ▁pa at ▁u ▁ra ▁bung ▁namu ga ▁taa ▁ra ▁bung ▁na ▁luka ara ▁na ▁waan ▁lika ai . </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁taara ▁I uda ia ▁diat ▁baal ui ▁ku ▁ma ▁ra ▁nga ala ▁na ▁inga andi at ▁naa , ▁" A ak ▁doko i ! ▁A ak ▁doko i ! ▁A ak ▁waati ▁u ▁ra ▁bolo !" ▁Pila ato ▁i ▁tiri ▁diat ▁naa , ▁" M ua at ▁nemi ▁naa ▁ang ▁aak ▁wa at ▁anum ua at ▁king ▁u ▁ra ▁bolo ?" ▁A ▁kum ▁nga ala ▁na ▁tena ▁w eta baar ▁kar om ▁God ▁diat ▁baal ui ▁naa , ▁" K aa isa ar ▁ot ▁ku ▁maa ▁an umia at ▁king !" </s> rai_Latn
▁Io , ▁Pila ato ▁i ▁taar ▁taa ▁Iesu ▁kar om ▁a ▁kum ▁tena ▁w inei um , ▁kupi ▁diat ▁a ▁aak ▁waati ▁u ▁ra ▁bolo . ▁Ma ▁diat ▁ben ▁paa ▁Iesu . </s> rai_Latn
▁Io , ▁Iesu ▁i ▁pari , ▁i ▁pu ak ▁paa ▁an una ▁bolo ▁ma ▁i ▁waan ▁kup ▁a ▁ta amaan ▁di ▁wa at ungi ▁ma ▁" P ia ▁na ▁Lor , " ▁ma ▁u ▁ra ▁pir pir ▁E bra ai o ▁di ▁wa at ungi ▁naa ▁Gol go taa . </s> rai_Latn
▁Io , ▁mat ira , ▁diat ▁aak ▁waati ▁u ▁ra ▁bolo . ▁Di at ▁aak ▁wa at ▁taa ▁ka ai ▁raa ▁ru ▁mua ana ▁unga ai ▁mai , ▁u ▁ra ▁ru ▁papa arina , ▁ma ▁Iesu ▁i ▁kete ▁nali wan ▁taan ▁dia ar . </s> rai_Latn
▁Ma ▁Pila ato ▁i ▁timu ▁a ▁tim timu ▁kupi ▁din ▁ungi ▁nate ▁u ▁ra ▁bolo . ▁A ▁tim timu ▁maa ▁i ▁len bi : ▁I ES U ▁A ▁TE ▁NA A SAR ET , ▁A ▁K ING ▁AN U ▁RA ▁TA ARA ▁IU DA IA . </s> rai_Latn

▁I aku ▁di ▁timu ▁paa ▁ku ▁raa ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁mi , ▁kupi ▁mua at ▁a ▁nur nur ▁baa ▁Iesu ▁ia ▁a ▁Ka arisito , ▁a ▁Nat un ▁God . ▁Ma ▁baa ▁mua at ▁nur nur ▁uni , ▁mua at ▁a ▁lalaa un ▁u ▁ra ▁ia ana . </s> rai_Latn
▁Nam ur , ▁Iesu ▁i ▁waan ▁pa at ▁balet ▁kar om ▁an una ▁kum ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer ▁u ▁ra ▁ta ai ▁kik il ▁Tib eria as . </s> rai_Latn
▁I ▁len bi : ▁Raa ▁bung ▁Simon ▁Petero ▁ma ▁Toma as , ▁di ▁wa at ungi ▁ka ai ▁naa ▁Ka anga , ▁ma ▁Nat anaa el ▁a ▁te ▁Ka ana ▁ko ▁ra ▁papa ar ▁Ga ali la ia , ▁ma ▁a ▁ru ▁nat un ▁Seb eda ai o , ▁ma ▁raa ▁ru di ▁ka ai ▁ko ▁ra ▁kum ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer , ▁diat ▁ki ▁unga ai . </s> rai_Latn
▁Ma ▁Simon ▁Petero ▁i ▁piri ▁taan ▁diat ▁naa , ▁" Ang ▁waan , ▁ang ▁a al ▁bene . " ▁Di at ▁baal ui ▁naa , ▁" Da at ▁unga ai . " ▁Io , ▁diat ▁kaa ▁ta au ▁u ▁ra ▁mon ▁ma ▁diat ▁waan . ▁I aku ▁u ▁ra ▁bung ▁na ▁mar um ▁maa , ▁pa ▁diat ▁a al ▁paa ▁ta ▁ian . </s> rai_Latn
▁Ma ▁u ▁ra ▁mala ana ▁kina lik , ▁Iesu ▁i ▁tur ▁ta au ▁nak ono , ▁i aku ▁a ▁kum ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer ▁pa ▁diat ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁Iesu ▁maa . </s> rai_Latn
▁Io , ▁Iesu ▁i ▁tiri ▁diat ▁naa , ▁" A ▁kum ▁naat , ▁mua at ▁a al ▁paa ▁ut ▁ta ▁ian ?" ▁Di at ▁we oro ▁naa , ▁" P ate ▁mulu . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Iesu ▁i ▁piri ▁taan ▁diat ▁naa , ▁" M ua at ▁a ▁ong ▁a ▁bene ▁u ▁ra ▁papa ara ▁ot ▁na ▁lima amua at , ▁kupi ▁mua at ▁a ▁a al ▁paa ▁ta ▁ian . " ▁Ma ▁diat ▁ongi ▁len maa ▁i ▁piri . ▁Io , ▁diat ▁ga ana ▁aala al ▁taa ▁a ▁bene , ▁maa ▁i ▁teng ▁ma ▁ra ▁kum ▁ian . </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer ▁baa ▁Iesu ▁i ▁nem nem ▁aak iti , ▁i ▁piri ▁taan ▁Petero ▁naa , ▁" A ▁Tada aru ▁ut ▁mane !" ▁Baa ▁Simon ▁Petero ▁i ▁walang oro i ▁naa ▁a ▁Tada aru ▁ut ▁mane , ▁i ▁gop ▁paa ▁balet ▁ina ▁ma alu ▁baa ▁i ▁pa laa ▁ta ai ▁baa ▁i ▁a al ▁bene , ▁ma ▁i ▁ir ok ▁lop ▁un ata ai . </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁kum ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer ▁diat ▁mur mur ▁ma ▁ra ▁mon ▁un akono . ▁Ma ▁diat ▁a al ▁pari ▁paa ▁a ▁bene ▁baa ▁i ▁teng ▁ma ▁ra ▁kum ▁ian , ▁maa ▁pa ▁diat ▁ki ▁wel we lik ▁ta anga ▁nak ono , ▁i ▁wela ar ▁ku ▁ma ▁50 ▁babal uka . </s> rai_Latn

▁Io , ▁Petero ▁i ▁kaa ▁u ▁ra ▁mon , ▁ma ▁i ▁a al ▁apari ▁a ▁bene ▁ma ▁i ▁lo ▁wa ▁a ▁kum ▁ian ▁koni . ▁I ▁teng ▁ma ▁ra ▁kum ▁nga alanga ala ▁na ▁ian , ▁a ▁nil uluk indi at ▁i ▁wela ar ▁ma ▁15 3. ▁Di at ▁mong mong oro ▁a akit , ▁i aku ▁a ▁bene ▁pa ▁i ▁tara ba at . </s> rai_Latn

▁A ▁wet ula ▁paka an ▁Iesu ▁i ▁piri ▁naa , ▁" S imon , ▁nat un ▁I oa anes , ▁le lawa ai , ▁u ▁nem ▁ia au ?" ▁Petero ▁i ▁ta pun uk , ▁kab ina ▁Iesu ▁i ▁tiri ▁tula ▁paka an ▁naa , ▁" U ▁nem ▁ia au ?" ▁I ▁piri ▁ta ana ▁naa , ▁" T ada aru , ▁u ▁nun ura ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁ra ap . ▁U ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁ia au ▁nem ▁ui . " ▁Iesu ▁i ▁piri ▁ta ana ▁naa , ▁" Un ▁taba ara ▁an ung ▁kum ▁sip . </s> rai_Latn
▁" I aa u ▁pir ▁a ▁ling tat una ▁ta am , ▁baa ▁u ▁baar maan , ▁ui ▁ut ▁u ▁la ana ▁wam ong ▁pa ▁ui , ▁ma ▁u ▁la ana ▁waan ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁wan ua ▁baa ▁u ▁nemi ▁un ▁waan ▁ia ai . ▁I aku ▁baa ▁un ▁taka ana , ▁un ▁kado ▁a ▁ru ▁lima am , ▁ma ▁raa ▁ingen ▁ut ▁in ▁wam ong ▁ui , ▁ma ▁in ▁ben ▁ta ▁ui ▁u ▁ra ▁wan ua ▁baa ▁pa ▁u ▁nem ▁na ▁waan ▁ia ai . " </s> rai_Latn

▁Petero ▁i ▁tur ▁tap uku ▁ma ▁i ▁babo ▁a ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer ▁baa ▁Iesu ▁i ▁nem nem ▁aak iti ▁kura a ▁i ▁mur mur ▁dia ar . ▁A ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer ▁maa , ▁ia ▁baa ▁i ▁ki ▁op ▁ta au ▁kar om ▁Iesu ▁u ▁ra ▁nun diat ▁tint inip ▁na ▁win anga an ▁ma ▁i ▁tiri ▁Iesu ▁naa , ▁" T ada aru , ▁woi ▁maa ▁in ▁w agu ▁ta ▁ui ?" </s> rai_Latn

▁A ▁naat ▁na ▁wa wer ▁mi ▁i ▁we wap ua ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁mi , ▁ma ▁i ▁timu ▁ak oto i . ▁Ma ▁da at ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁mi ▁i ▁we wap ua ▁uni , ▁i ▁ling tat una ▁a akit . </s> rai_Latn
▁Mong oro ▁na ▁ut naa ▁ut ka ai ▁Iesu ▁ia ▁paam ▁ta ai . ▁Baa ▁gun ▁din ▁timu ▁ra ap ▁pa ▁diat ▁ra araa , ▁ia au ▁nuk i ▁naa ▁a ▁rak raka an ▁bua al ▁pa ▁i ▁nga ala ▁kupi ▁din ▁ung ▁a ▁kum ▁buk ▁ra ap ▁uni . </s> rai_Latn
▁Kar om ▁Ti op ilo , ▁U ▁ra ▁nung ▁muga ana ▁buk ▁ia au ▁timu ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁ra ap ▁baa ▁Iesu ▁ia ▁paam ▁ta ai ▁ma ▁ia ▁wer ▁taa ▁a ▁taara ▁uni ▁u ▁ra ▁tur pa ai ▁ra ▁nuna ▁pin apa am , ▁tuk ▁u ▁ra ▁bung ▁baa ▁God ▁i ▁lo ▁paai ▁una anga ▁u ▁ra ▁maa wa . ▁Nam ur ▁taa ▁ra ▁nuna ▁mina at , ▁i ▁waan waan ▁pa at ▁balet ▁kar om ▁an una ▁kum ▁aap ostolo , ▁ma ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁baa ▁i ▁pa ami ▁i ▁wal ing tat una ▁m ului ▁naa ▁ia ▁lalaa un ▁balet ▁ko ▁ra ▁mina at . ▁40 ▁bung ▁i ▁ki ▁paai ▁balet ▁min ▁nap ia ▁ma ▁i ▁waan waan ▁pa at ▁kar om ▁diat , ▁ma ▁i ▁pir pir ▁u ▁ra ▁mata an itu ▁anun ▁God . ▁Ia ▁wer ▁taa ▁an una ▁kum ▁aap ostolo ▁ma ▁ra ▁dek dek ▁i ▁ra ▁Tak ado ▁na ▁Ni on , ▁a ▁kum ▁aap ostolo ▁baa ▁i ▁pi lak ▁pa ▁diat . </s> rai_Latn
▁Un ▁raa ▁bung ▁ko ▁ra ▁kum ▁bung bung ▁maa ▁baa ▁ia ▁tur ▁balet ▁ko ▁ra ▁mina at ▁diat ▁ki ▁unga ai ▁u ▁ra ▁win anga an ▁ma ▁i ▁tur ba at ▁diat ▁naa , ▁" K oku ▁mua at ▁waan ▁kon ▁Ier usalem , ▁mua at ▁a ▁ki ▁wala anga ▁paa ▁a ▁Tak ado ▁na ▁Ni on ▁baa ▁Tama ang ▁i ▁we weli man ▁ta au ▁uni , ▁baa ▁ia au ▁aa ▁wap ua ▁ta ▁mua at ▁uni . </s> rai_Latn
▁I oa anes ▁i ▁ba apita a iso ▁ma ▁ra ▁pa laa , ▁ma ▁mi ▁pa ▁i ▁wel we lik ▁ma ▁a ▁bung , ▁baa ▁din ▁ba apita a iso ▁mua at ▁ma ▁ra ▁Tak ado ▁na ▁Ni on . " </s> rai_Latn

▁Baa ▁a ▁Tak ado ▁na ▁Ni on ▁in ▁ki ▁un ▁mua at , ▁mua at ▁a ▁paam ▁ak oto ▁a ▁dek dek , ▁ma ▁a ▁ut naa ▁baa ▁mua at ▁babo i ▁un ▁ia au ▁mua at ▁a ▁we wap ua ▁uni ▁ina anga ▁Ier usalem , ▁ma ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁ta amta amaan ▁ra ap ▁ir ong ▁u ▁ra ▁ru ▁papa ar ▁I uda ia ▁ma ▁Sama aria , ▁ma ▁u ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al ▁ra ap . " </s> rai_Latn

▁Ma ▁dia ar ▁piri ▁naa , ▁" M ua at ▁a ▁kum ▁te ▁Ga ali la ia , ▁kup ▁aa wa ▁maa ▁mua at ▁tur tur ▁ma ▁mua at ▁tat ata ada ▁una anga ▁u ▁ra ▁ba akut ? ▁Iesu ▁mana anga ▁baa ▁di ▁aa ▁lo ▁paai ▁kon ▁mua at ▁una anga ▁u ▁ra ▁maa wa , ▁in ▁waan ▁pa at ▁balet ▁urin , ▁len ut mi ▁mua at ▁babo ▁wai ▁i ▁waan ▁una anga ▁nate . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Io , ▁a ▁kum ▁aap ostolo ▁diat ▁waan ▁tali li ▁balet ▁una anga ▁Ier usalem ▁ko ▁ra ▁ta anga ai ▁di ▁wa at ungi ▁naa ▁a ▁Ta anga ai ▁na ▁O liwa . ▁I ▁mara wa ai ▁ku ▁Ier usalem , ▁wela ar ▁ma ▁raa ▁kilomita . </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁diat ▁waan ▁pa at ▁ina anga ▁Ier usalem , ▁diat ▁ruk ▁u ▁ra ▁ruma ▁ma ▁diat ▁ki ▁u ▁ra ▁kukur ▁ra ▁ruma ▁ina anga ▁nate , ▁baa ▁diat ▁in inep ▁ma ▁diat ▁kiki ▁uni . ▁Bari ▁diat ▁maa ▁diat ▁ki ▁unga ai ▁mat ira : ▁Petero , ▁I oa anes , ▁Ia ak obo , ▁A and eria as , ▁Pili po , ▁Toma as , ▁Baat oloma ai o , ▁Ma ata io , ▁Ia ak obo ▁nat un ▁A ali pa ai o , ▁Simon ▁raa ▁ko ▁ra ▁kik il ▁Sil ot , ▁ma ▁I uda as , ▁nat un ▁raa ▁Ia ak obo ▁ingen . </s> rai_Latn

▁I uda as ▁i ▁kul ▁paa ▁a ▁paka ana ▁pia ▁ma ▁ra ▁ma ani ▁ko ▁ra ▁nuna ▁a aka ina ▁pin apa am ▁baa ▁i ▁pa ami . ▁Mat ira ▁u ▁ra ▁nuna ▁pia ▁i ▁puka ▁pari , ▁ma ▁in ▁bala ana ▁i ▁tapu ek ▁nali wan , ▁ma ▁ra ▁win wina ai ▁na ▁bala ana ▁i ▁kala a ▁pa at ▁un ata amaan . </s> rai_Latn

▁Io , ▁i ▁ko ina ▁baa ▁da at ▁a ▁pi lak ▁paa ▁ta ▁mua ana ▁kupi ▁ia ▁ka ai ▁a ▁tena ▁we wap ua ▁ka apa ▁unga ai ▁ma ▁da at ▁un ▁Iesu ▁naa ▁i ▁tur ▁balet ▁ko ▁ra ▁mina at . ▁I ▁ko ina ▁baa ▁a ▁mua ana ▁maa , ▁te ▁ut ▁ko ▁ra ▁n unda at ▁kik il , ▁baa ▁da at ▁kiki ▁unga ai ▁ma ▁Iesu . ▁A ▁mua ana ▁baa ▁i ▁ki ▁unga ai ▁ma ▁da at ▁tur pa ai ▁baa ▁I oa anes ▁i ▁ba apita a iso ▁tuk ▁u ▁ra ▁bung ▁baa ▁di ▁lo ▁paa ▁Iesu ▁kon ▁da at ▁una anga ▁u ▁ra ▁maa wa . " </s> rai_Latn

▁Baa ▁Petero ▁i ▁babo ▁diat , ▁i ▁piri ▁taan ▁diat ▁naa , ▁" M ua at ▁a ▁taara ▁Israa el , ▁aa wa ▁kab ina ▁baa ▁mua at ▁kaka ian ▁u ▁ra ▁ut naa ▁mi ▁ma ▁mua at ▁babo ▁dek dek ▁mir ? ▁Lela wa ai , ▁mua at ▁nuk i ▁naa ▁mir ▁wala angala anga ▁paa ▁a ▁mua ana ▁mi ▁ma ▁ra ▁dek dek imir ▁ut , ▁baa ▁u ▁ra ▁ko ina ▁mag ira amir ? ▁Pate ! </s> rai_Latn
▁God ▁ut ▁i ▁pa ami . ▁A ▁God ▁anun ▁Aab ara am ▁ma ▁Aa isa ak ▁ma ▁Ia ak ob , ▁a ▁God ▁anu ▁ra ▁n unda at ▁w una ▁taara ▁ta anga ▁namu ga , ▁i ▁wanga ala ▁taa ▁a ▁ia an ▁Iesu ▁an una ▁t ult ul . ▁Mua at ▁taar ▁ta ai ▁kupi ▁din ▁aak ▁doko i , ▁ma ▁mua at ▁we oro ▁ku ▁koni ▁nam ataan ▁Pila ato , ▁baa ▁i ▁nemi ▁naa ▁in ▁pa laa ▁wai . </s> rai_Latn
▁Mua at ▁we oro ▁wa ▁a ▁Tena ▁Gom gom ▁ma ▁a ▁Tena ▁Tak ado ▁ma ▁mua at ▁a aring ▁kupi ▁din ▁pa laa ▁taa ▁a ▁tena ▁a aka ak ▁doko ▁taara ▁kar om ▁mua at . </s> rai_Latn
▁Ma ▁mua at ▁aak ▁doko ▁wa ▁Iesu , ▁ia ▁baa ▁a ▁kabi ▁ra ▁lalaa un , ▁i aku ▁God ▁i ▁wat ur ▁paai ▁balet ▁ko ▁ra ▁mina at . ▁Ma ▁mia at , ▁mia at ▁babo i ▁ma ▁mia at ▁we wap ua ▁ka apa ▁uni . </s> rai_Latn
▁U ▁ra ▁nur nur ▁u ▁ra ▁ia an ▁Iesu , ▁di ▁wad ek dek ▁paa ▁a ▁mua ana ▁mi ▁baa ▁mua at ▁babo i , ▁ma ▁mua at ▁nun urai . ▁U ▁ra ▁nur nur ▁u ▁ra ▁ia an ▁Iesu ▁di ▁wala angala anga ▁paa ▁a ▁mua ana ▁mi ▁nam ata amua at ▁ra ap . </s> rai_Latn
▁" A ▁kum ▁tat eng ▁liklik , ▁ia au ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁mua at ▁ma ▁ra ▁num ua at ▁kum ▁muk mu ga ▁ka ai ▁mua at ▁paam ▁bia a ▁ku ▁a ▁ut naa ▁mi ▁un ▁Iesu , ▁pa ▁mua at ▁nun urai ▁aa wa ▁maa ▁mua at ▁pa ami . </s> rai_Latn
▁I aku ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁mi ▁mua at ▁pa ami , ▁God ▁i ▁paam ▁ot ▁paa ▁a ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁baa ▁ia ▁pir ▁ta ai ▁namu ga ▁ut ba ai ▁ma ▁ra ▁pir pir ▁anu ▁ra ▁kum ▁prop et ▁ra ap ▁naa ▁an una ▁Ka arisito ▁in ▁maat . </s> rai_Latn
▁Io , ▁mua at ▁a ▁nuk p uku , ▁ma ▁mua at ▁a ▁waan ▁kar om ▁God , ▁kupi ▁in ▁una ▁wa ▁anum ua at ▁kum ▁a aka ina ▁mang amanga an . </s> rai_Latn

▁' A ▁Tada aru ▁i ▁piri : ▁A ▁maa wa ▁ia ▁an ung ▁kiki ▁na ▁king , ▁ma ▁ra ▁rak raka an ▁bua al ▁a ▁ut naa ▁baa ▁ia au ▁ung ▁a ▁ru ▁kak ing ▁nate ▁uni . ▁Io , ▁le lawa ai , ▁i ▁tale ▁mua at ▁baa ▁mua at ▁a ▁paam ▁ta ▁ruma ▁an ung ? ▁Wa iaa ▁an ung ▁wan ua ▁na ▁ningo ? </s> rai_Latn

▁Ma ▁Ste pa ano ▁i ▁piri ▁taa ▁ra ▁taara ▁na ▁ki wung ▁naa , ▁" M ua at ▁a ▁kum ▁tena ▁wa bul bul ▁mua at , ▁a ▁bala amua at ▁i ▁wel we lik ▁kon ▁God ▁ma ▁ra ▁tal inga amua at ▁i ▁taban ot . ▁Mua at ▁tur ba at ▁liklik ina ▁a ▁Tak ado ▁na ▁Ni on , ▁wela ar ▁ma ▁ra ▁num ua at ▁w una ▁taara ▁ta anga ▁namu ga ▁diat ▁pa ampa ami . </s> rai_Latn
▁W oi ▁na ▁kum ▁prop et ▁maa ▁anum ua at ▁w una ▁taara ▁ta anga ▁namu ga ▁pa ▁diat ▁baana akaka ▁diat ? ▁Di at ▁aak ▁doko ▁diat , ▁baa ▁diat ▁pir pir ▁muga ▁u ▁ra ▁wina waan ▁pa at ▁urin ▁anu ▁ra ▁Tena ▁Tak ado , ▁ia ▁baa ▁mi ▁mua at ▁w agu ▁paai , ▁ma ▁mua at ▁aak ▁doko ▁wai , </s> rai_Latn
▁mua at ▁baa ▁mua at ▁aa ▁lo ▁ak oto ▁a ▁kum ▁Na aga gon ▁baa ▁kum ▁aang elo ▁diat ▁taar ▁ta ai ▁kar om ▁mua at , ▁i aku ▁pa ▁mua at ▁mur m uri . " </s> rai_Latn

▁Di at ▁tul ▁waana wa anai ▁ko ▁ra ▁ta amaan , ▁ma ▁diat ▁d ukai . ▁Ma ▁diat ▁baa ▁diat ▁tak una ▁Ste pa ano ▁ma ▁ra ▁kum ▁war war uga ▁na ▁pir pir , ▁diat ▁pa laa ▁wa ▁an undi at ▁kum ▁ma alu ▁baa ▁diat ▁burung ▁baat ▁an undi at ▁min ong ▁mai ▁ma ▁diat ▁ung ▁ta ai ▁naa ▁ra ▁ru ▁kak in ▁raa ▁baar maan ▁a ▁ia ana ▁Saul . </s> rai_Latn
▁Baa ▁kura a ▁ut ba ai ▁diat ▁duk d ukai , ▁Ste pa ano ▁i ▁a ara aring ▁naa , ▁" T ada aru ▁Iesu , ▁un ▁lo ▁paa ▁a ▁ni ong . " </s> rai_Latn

▁Ma ▁a ▁Tada aru ▁i ▁piri ▁ta ana ▁naa , ▁" Un ▁tur , ▁ma ▁un ▁waan ▁u ▁ra ▁aak api , ▁baa ▁di ▁wa at ungi ▁naa ▁Tak ado ▁na ▁A ak api , ▁ma ▁un ▁wet iri ▁u ▁ra ▁ruma ▁anun ▁I uda as ▁kup ▁Saul , ▁a ▁te ▁Ta aso , ▁kur ong ▁i ▁a ara aring . </s> rai_Latn
▁Saul ▁ia ▁babo ▁wa ▁a ▁mua ana ▁u ▁ra ▁bina bo , ▁a ▁ia ana ▁A anan ia , ▁i ▁ruk ▁kar omi , ▁ma ▁i ▁ung ▁a ▁ru ▁lima ana ▁nate ▁uni ▁kupi ▁in ▁babo ▁balet . " </s> rai_Latn

▁Io , ▁A anan ia ▁i ▁waan , ▁ma ▁i ▁ruk ▁u ▁ra ▁ruma ▁baa ▁Saul ▁i ▁ki ▁ia ai . ▁Ma ▁i ▁ung ▁a ▁ru ▁lima ana ▁nate ▁uni , ▁ma ▁i ▁piri ▁naa , ▁" T eng lik ▁Saul , ▁a ▁Tada aru ▁Iesu , ▁ia ▁baa ▁i ▁tur ▁pa at ▁paa ▁kar om ▁ui ▁u ▁ra ▁aak api ▁baa ▁u ▁waan ▁urin , ▁ia ▁ut ▁mi ▁i ▁tula ▁wa ▁ia au ▁urin ▁kupi ▁un ▁babo ▁balet , ▁ma ▁kupi ▁un ▁teng ▁ma ▁ra ▁Tak ado ▁na ▁Ni on . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Ma ▁raa ▁ut naa ▁baa ▁i ▁wela ar ▁ma ▁ra ▁kaa wala ang ▁na ▁ian ▁i ▁kat uk ▁pari ▁maut ▁ko ▁ra ▁ruin ▁ki ok ▁mata ana , ▁ma ▁i ▁babo ▁balet . ▁I ▁tur ▁ma ▁di ▁ba apita a iso i . </s> rai_Latn

▁Ma ▁diat ▁ra ap ▁baa ▁diat ▁walang oro i , ▁diat ▁kaka ian ▁uni ▁ma ▁diat ▁piri ▁naa , ▁" A ai ! ▁Mi ▁ut ▁ia ▁a ▁mua ana ▁baa ▁i ▁a aka ak ▁doko ▁diat ▁baa ▁diat ▁lotu ▁kar om ▁Iesu ▁ina anga ▁Ier usalem . ▁Ma ▁mi ▁i ▁waan ▁pa at ▁urin ▁kupi ▁in ▁a al ▁paa ▁bul ung ▁ta ▁taara ▁kar om ▁a ▁kum ▁nga ala ▁na ▁tena ▁w eta baar ▁kar om ▁God . " </s> rai_Latn

▁I aku ▁Saul ▁ia ▁nun urai ▁naa ▁diat ▁we pa ak ▁kupi . ▁U ▁ra ▁mage ▁ma ▁u ▁ra ▁mar um ▁diat ▁baba bo ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁bon ana aka ▁i ▁ra ▁ta amaan ▁kup ▁Saul , ▁kupi ▁diat ▁a ▁aak ▁doko i . </s> rai_Latn

" </s> rai_Latn
▁Di at ▁nur nur ▁mara aga am ▁uni . ▁Io , ▁Saul ▁i ▁ki ▁unga ai ▁ma ▁ra ▁taara ▁na ▁nur nur ▁ina anga ▁Ier usalem , ▁ma ▁i ▁waan ▁tal tali li ▁naan ▁diat , ▁ma ▁i ▁pir pir ▁maut ▁u ▁ra ▁ia a ▁ra ▁Tada aru , ▁ma ▁pa ▁i ▁bur ut . </s> rai_Latn

▁Ma ▁Petero ▁i ▁tara am ▁ma ▁dit ul ▁we ur . ▁Baa ▁i ▁waan ▁pa at , ▁diat ▁ben ▁paai ▁una anga ▁u ▁ra ▁kukur ▁ra ▁ruma ▁nate . ▁Ma ▁a ▁kum ▁walaa ▁na ▁tabu an ▁ra ap ▁diat ▁tur ▁kar omi ▁ma ▁diat ▁ta ang ta angi . ▁Ma ▁diat ▁wa iaa ▁taa ▁a ▁kum ▁mul ina ▁ma ▁ra ▁kum ▁ma alu , ▁baa ▁D oka as ▁i ▁ing it ▁ta ▁diat ▁baa ▁i ▁lalaa un ▁ut ba ai . </s> rai_Latn

▁Ma ▁in ▁in gaan ▁raa ▁i ▁baal ui ▁balet ▁naa , ▁" A ▁ut naa ▁baa ▁God ▁ia ▁wag om gom ▁ta ai , ▁koku ▁u ▁wa at ungi ▁baa ▁a ▁dur ▁na ▁ut naa . " </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁ut naa ▁mi ▁di ▁pa ami ▁wela ar ▁ma ▁tula ▁paka an , ▁ma ▁di ▁a al ▁tato ▁paai ▁balet ▁una anga ▁u ▁ra ▁maa wa . </s> rai_Latn

▁Dit ul ▁baal ui ▁naa , ▁" K one lio , ▁a ▁muk mu ga ▁anun ▁100 ▁na ▁taara ▁na ▁w inei um ▁i ▁tula ▁wa ▁mit ul . ▁Kone lio ▁ia ▁raa ▁tena ▁tak ado ▁ma ▁a ▁tena ▁urur ▁kar om ▁God , ▁ma ▁a ▁taara ▁I uda ia ▁ra ap ▁diat ▁urur ▁uni . ▁A ▁gom gom ▁na ▁aang elo ▁anun ▁God ▁i ▁wap ua ▁ta ai ▁naa ▁in ▁wet ulaa ▁pa ▁ui ▁ur ong ▁u ▁ra ▁nuna ▁ruma , ▁kupi ▁in ▁walang oro ▁anum ▁ta ▁pir pir . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Io , ▁Petero ▁i ▁ben ▁ruk ▁pa ▁dit ul ▁kupi ▁dit ul ▁a ▁in ep ▁paa . ▁Baa ▁i ▁keke ▁pa at , ▁Petero ▁i ▁tur ▁ma ▁diat ▁waan , ▁ma ▁raa ▁kum ▁mua ana ▁baa ▁diat ▁tat ena ▁liklik ▁u ▁ra ▁nur nur ▁ta anga ▁I ope ▁diat ▁we ur ▁unga ai ▁ma ▁diat . </s> rai_Latn

▁A ▁taara ▁na ▁nur nur ▁baa ▁diat ▁waan ▁wer wera an ▁ta ang ina anga ▁Ier usalem ▁kab ina ▁baa ▁a ▁taara ▁diat ▁pet ▁na ▁bil bil ▁un ▁diat ▁nam ur ▁taa ▁ra ▁mina atin ▁Ste pa ano , ▁diat ▁waan ▁wel we lik ▁ur ong ▁u ▁ra ▁papa ar ▁Pon ikaa , ▁a ▁lolo ▁Kip ro , ▁ma ▁a ▁ta amaan ▁A anti okia . ▁Di at ▁we wap ua ▁ku ▁kar om ▁a ▁taara ▁I uda ia ▁u ▁ra ▁Ko ina ▁We wap ua ▁un ▁Iesu . </s> rai_Latn

▁Ba ana aba as ▁ia ▁raa ▁ko ina ▁mua ana , ▁i ▁teng ▁ma ▁ra ▁Tak ado ▁na ▁Ni on ▁ma ▁ra ▁nur nur . ▁Baa ▁i ▁waan ▁pa at ▁ma ▁i ▁babo ▁a ▁maar ma ari ▁anun ▁God ▁baa ▁i ▁papa am ▁un ▁diat , ▁i ▁gaa ia ▁uni , ▁ma ▁i ▁wad ek dek ▁diat ▁ra ap ▁kupi ▁diat ▁a ▁tur ▁dek dek ▁u ▁ra ▁nur nur ▁ma ▁ra ▁nun diat ▁lalaa un ▁ra ap ▁kar om ▁a ▁Tada aru . ▁Ma ▁mong oro ▁na ▁taara ▁diat ▁nuk p uku ▁kar om ▁a ▁Tada aru . </s> rai_Latn

▁Baa ▁ia ▁baat ▁paai , ▁i ▁ben ▁paai ▁ur ong ▁A anti okia . ▁Raa ▁kud ula ana ▁kila ala ▁dia ar ▁ki ▁unga ai ▁ma ▁ra ▁taara ▁na ▁nur nur ▁mar ong , ▁ma ▁dia ar ▁wer ▁mong oro ▁na ▁taara . ▁Ta lek ▁u ▁ra ▁paka ana ▁bung ▁maa ▁di ▁wa at ung ▁a ▁taara ▁na ▁wa wer ▁ir ong ▁A anti okia ▁naa ▁a ▁kum ▁te ▁Ka arisito . </s> rai_Latn
▁U ▁ra ▁kila ala ▁maa , ▁raa ▁kum ▁prop et ▁diat ▁waan ▁ta ang ina anga ▁Ier usalem ▁ur ong ▁A anti okia . </s> rai_Latn
▁Raa ▁kon ▁diat , ▁a ▁ia ana ▁A aga bo , ▁i ▁tur , ▁ma ▁u ▁ra ▁dek dek ▁i ▁ra ▁Tak ado ▁na ▁Ni on ▁i ▁we wap ua ▁muga ▁ta au ▁u ▁ra ▁nga ala ▁na ▁min olo ▁baa ▁in ▁man ong ▁a ▁kum ▁ta amta amaan ▁ra ap . ▁A ▁min olo ▁mi ▁i ▁waan ▁pa at ▁u ▁ra ▁kila ala ▁baa ▁Kla au dio ▁i ▁na aga gon ▁ir ong ▁Rom . </s> rai_Latn

▁A ▁kum ▁tena ▁mana ana ▁u ▁ra ▁wa wer ▁anu ▁ra ▁kik il ▁Ep ik ure ▁ma ▁kik il ▁Sto iko ▁diat ▁wei um ▁na ▁pir pir ▁mai . ▁Raa ▁taara ▁diat ▁piri ▁naa , ▁" A awa ▁mi ▁a ▁tena ▁pir pir ▁bia a ▁mi ▁i ▁wap ua ▁da at ▁uni ?" ▁Ma ▁raa ▁taara ▁ka ai ▁diat ▁piri ▁len bi , ▁" Kana api ▁i ▁wap ua ▁da at ▁duk ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁mat akina ▁god ▁kon ▁ta ▁ta amaan ▁ingen . " ▁Di at ▁piri ▁len bi ▁kab ina ▁maa ▁i ▁wara wa ai ▁un ▁Iesu ▁ma ▁ra ▁lalaa un ▁balet ▁ko ▁ra ▁mina at . </s> rai_Latn
▁Di at ▁ben ▁paai , ▁ma ▁diat ▁waan ▁mai ▁una anga ▁u ▁ra ▁wan ua ▁na ▁ki wung ▁di ▁wa at ungi ▁ma ▁A ari opa ago , ▁ma ▁diat ▁piri ▁len bi , ▁" M ia at ▁nemi ▁naa ▁mia at ▁a ▁walang oro i ▁baa ▁aa wa ▁a ▁mat akina ▁pir pir ▁baa ▁u ▁wer ▁mia at ▁uni . </s> rai_Latn
▁A ▁ut naa ▁baa ▁u ▁pir pir ▁uni ▁i ▁raa unga ana ▁a akit ▁kar om ▁mia at , ▁ma ▁mia at ▁nemi ▁kupi ▁mia at ▁a ▁mana ana ▁u ▁ra ▁kukura ai ▁ra ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁mi . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Di at ▁piri ▁len bi ▁kab ina ▁a ▁kum ▁te ▁A at ena ai ▁ma ▁ra ▁kum ▁wa ira ▁ka ai ▁baa ▁diat ▁kiki ▁mat ira , ▁diat ▁ole ▁a ▁kum ▁bung bung ▁ma ▁ra ▁pir pir ▁ma ▁ra ▁wal walang or ▁kup ▁ta ▁mat akina ▁wa wer . </s> rai_Latn

" </s> rai_Latn
▁Ma ▁baa ▁ia ▁nga ala ▁a ▁weng anga ar , ▁ma ▁diat ▁aa ▁tur paa ▁w inei um , ▁a ▁nga ala ▁na ▁muk mu ga ▁anu ▁ra ▁kum ▁tena ▁w inei um ▁i ▁bur ut , ▁kad uk ▁diat ▁a ▁um ▁a akaka ▁taa ▁Paa ulo . ▁Ma ▁i ▁tula ▁wa ▁a ▁taara ▁na ▁w inei um , ▁kupi ▁diat ▁a ▁waan ▁ma ▁diat ▁a ▁a al ▁paai ▁ko ▁ra ▁taara , ▁ma ▁diat ▁a ▁ben ▁paai ▁kup ▁a ▁ruma ▁anu ▁ra ▁taara ▁na ▁w inei um . </s> rai_Latn
▁U ▁ra ▁mar um , ▁a ▁Tada aru ▁i ▁waan ▁pa at ▁paa ▁kar om ▁Paa ulo , ▁ma ▁i ▁piri ▁ta ana ▁naa , ▁" K oku ▁u ▁bur ut , ▁un ▁tur ▁dek dek . ▁U ▁aa ▁we wap ua ▁ka apa ▁ta au ▁un ▁ia au ▁min ▁Ier usalem , ▁len maa ▁un ▁we wap ua ▁ka apa ▁ut ka ai ▁un ▁ia au ▁ir ong ▁Rom . " </s> rai_Latn
▁K eke ▁pa at ▁balet ▁raa ▁bung ▁na ▁mala ana , ▁raa ▁kum ▁te ▁I uda ia ▁diat ▁wela ar ▁ma ▁40 ▁ma ▁i ▁puka ▁diat ▁pir pir ▁unga ai ▁paa ▁kupi ▁diat ▁a ▁we weli man , ▁naa ▁pain ▁diat ▁a ▁wanga an , ▁ma ▁pain ▁diat ▁a ▁inim , ▁tuk ▁ut ▁baa ▁diat ▁aa ▁aak ▁doko ▁wa ▁Paa ulo . </s> rai_Latn

▁Baa ▁ia ▁ra ap ▁lima ▁na ▁bung , ▁A anan ia , ▁a ▁muk mu ga ▁na ▁tena ▁w eta baar ▁kar om ▁God ▁ma ▁raa ▁kum ▁muk mu ga ▁ko ▁ra ▁lotu , ▁ma ▁Tert ulo , ▁a ▁tena ▁mana ana ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁na aga gon , ▁diat ▁waan ▁pa at ▁ir ong ▁Kaa isa aria , ▁ma ▁diat ▁wap ua ▁Pe lik ▁a ▁nga ala ▁na ▁muk mu ga ▁ko ▁ra ▁mata an itu ▁u ▁ra ▁nun diat ▁kum ▁wet akun ▁un ▁Paa ulo . </s> rai_Latn

▁Io , ▁pang ▁pir pir ▁mong mong oro , ▁kad uk ▁ang ▁wat al angu an ▁ui . ▁I aa u ▁a aring ▁ui ▁baa ▁un ▁maari ▁mia at ▁ma ▁un ▁walang oro ▁an umia at ▁ta ▁kina lik ▁na ▁pir pir . </s> rai_Latn

▁Ma ▁pa ▁diat ▁a ▁wal ing tat una ▁la ar ▁paa ▁an undi at ▁kum ▁wet akun ▁kar om ▁ui ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁mi ▁baa ▁diat ▁tak una ▁ia au ▁uni . </s> rai_Latn
▁" Io , ▁mi ▁ang ▁wap ua ▁ka apa ▁ui ▁naa , ▁ia au ▁mur mur ▁a ▁A ak api ▁anun ▁Ka arisito , ▁baa ▁diat ▁wa at ungi ▁ma ▁ra ▁war war uga ▁na ▁lotu . ▁I aku ▁u ▁ra ▁lotu ▁mi , ▁ia au ▁lotu ▁ut ▁kar om ▁God ▁anu ▁ra ▁num ia at ▁w una ▁taara ▁ta anga ▁namu ga , ▁ma ▁ia au ▁nur nur ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁ut naa ▁ra ap ▁baa ▁di ▁aa ▁timu ▁ta ai ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁Na aga gon ▁ma ▁u ▁ra ▁kum ▁buk ▁anu ▁ra ▁kum ▁prop et . </s> rai_Latn
▁An ung ▁nur nur ▁un ▁God ▁i ▁wela ar ▁ma ▁ra ▁taara ▁mi . ▁I aa u ▁ka ai ▁ia au ▁ki ▁wala ang ▁ma ▁ra ▁nur nur ▁baa ▁God ▁in ▁wat ur ▁paa ▁balet ▁a ▁ko ina ▁taara ▁ma ▁ra ▁a aka ina ▁taara ▁ko ▁ra ▁mina at . </s> rai_Latn

▁" I aa u ▁ki ▁ingen ▁paa ▁kon ▁Ier usalem ▁a ▁kaba ana ▁kila ala ▁ut , ▁io , ▁nam ur ▁ia au ▁waan ▁tali li ▁una anga ▁kupi ▁ang ▁lo ▁a ▁ma ani ▁na ▁w eta baar ▁kar om ▁an ung ▁taara , ▁ma ▁kupi ▁ang ▁taar ▁ka ai ▁a ▁kum ▁we wag ua ▁kupi ▁din ▁tun ▁diat ▁wela ar ▁ma ▁ra ▁w eta baar ▁kar om ▁God . </s> rai_Latn
▁N amu ga ▁baa ▁pa ▁ia au ▁ruk ▁ut ba ai ▁u ▁ra ▁ruma ▁na ▁w eta baar ▁ia au ▁aa ▁paam ▁ra ap ▁taa ▁a ▁kum ▁na aga gon ▁kupi ▁ang ▁gom gom ▁nam ataan ▁God . ▁Baa ▁ia au ▁aa ▁ruk ▁kupi ▁ang ▁paam ▁a ▁pin apa am ▁na ▁w eta baar , ▁pa ▁diat ▁bara ata ▁ia au ▁ma ▁ta ▁mong oro ▁na ▁taara , ▁ma ▁pa ▁ia au ▁paam ▁ka ai ▁ta ▁pur p uruan . </s> rai_Latn
▁I aku ▁raa ▁taara ▁I uda ia ▁ta ang ir ong ▁u ▁ra ▁papa ar ▁A asia ▁diat ▁ki ▁u ▁ra ▁ruma ▁na ▁w eta baar ▁u ▁ra ▁bung ▁maa ▁baa ▁diat ▁paam ▁ak oto ▁pa ▁ia au . ▁Baa ▁ta ▁ut naa ▁diat ▁a ▁tak una ▁ia au ▁uni , ▁in ▁ko ina ▁kupi ▁diat ▁ut ▁diat ▁a ▁waan ▁urin ▁ma ▁diat ▁a ▁tak una ▁ia au ▁nam ata am . </s> rai_Latn
▁Ma ▁i ▁ko ina ▁baa ▁diat ▁baa ▁kuri ▁diat , ▁diat ▁a ▁pir ▁ta ▁a aka ina ▁ut naa ▁baa ▁diat ▁baat ▁paai ▁un ▁ia au , ▁baa ▁ia au ▁tur ▁nam ataa ▁ra ▁taara ▁na ▁ki wung ▁ina anga ▁Ier usalem . </s> rai_Latn
▁Na api ▁duk , ▁diat ▁tak una ▁ia au ▁u ▁ra ▁nung ▁raa ▁pir pir ▁ku . ▁Baa ▁ia au ▁tur ▁nam ata andi at , ▁ia au ▁pir pir ▁dek dek ▁len bi , ▁' I aa u ▁tur ▁u ▁ra ▁na aga gon ▁nam ata amua at ▁mari , ▁kab ina ▁ia au ▁nur nur ▁u ▁ra ▁lalaa un ▁balet ▁ko ▁ra ▁mina at .'" </s> rai_Latn
▁Pe lik ▁i ▁ka apa ▁waka ak ▁ut ▁u ▁ra ▁lotu ▁mi ▁di ▁wa at ungi ▁ma ▁ra ▁A ak api ▁anun ▁Ka arisito , ▁ma ▁i ▁wango ▁taa ▁kum un ▁a ▁na aga gon , ▁ma ▁i ▁piri ▁naa , ▁" B aa ▁L isia , ▁a ▁nga ala ▁na ▁muk mu ga ▁anu ▁ra ▁taara ▁na ▁w inei um ▁in ▁waan ▁pa at , ▁ang ▁ung ▁mara aga am ▁ta ▁na aga gon ▁u ▁ra ▁wet akun ▁mi . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Ma ▁i ▁wap ua ▁a ▁muk mu ga ▁anu ▁ra ▁kum ▁tena ▁w inei um ▁naa , ▁" P aa ulo ▁in ▁ki ▁na ▁kara bus ▁u ▁ra ▁num ▁na aga gon . ▁Un ▁babo urai ▁ma ▁ra ▁maar ma ari , ▁ma ▁koku ▁u ▁tur ba at ▁wa ▁a ▁kum ▁te pte pa ana ▁baa ▁diat ▁a ▁wara a uti . " </s> rai_Latn
▁Raa ▁kaba ana ▁bung ▁baat ▁ta ai , ▁Pe lik ▁i ▁waan ▁pa at ▁balet , ▁dia ar ▁ma ▁ra ▁nuna ▁taula a ▁Daar us ila , ▁a ▁tabu an ▁I uda ia . ▁Pe lik ▁i ▁wet ulaa ▁kup ▁Paa ulo , ▁ma ▁i ▁walang oro ▁an una ▁pir pir ▁u ▁ra ▁nur nur ▁un ▁Ka arisito ▁Iesu . </s> rai_Latn

" </s> rai_Latn
